高频作者

AI 研究兴趣分析

研究兴趣：该研究者主要关注地球深部过程，特别是俯冲带的变质岩石学、地球化学和动力学。其核心兴趣在于理解俯冲带内物质循环、流体活动以及高压变质作用的机制。

深度关注：研究者在变质岩石学、俯冲带动力学、地球化学及元素循环领域有持续深入的阅读积累。通过对高频作者（如Lifei Zhang, Jun Gao, Timm John等）和顶级期刊（如EPSL, GCA, Lithos）的关注，表明其对这些领域的前沿进展和经典理论都有着扎实的了解。

跨学科倾向：该研究者的阅读倾向主要集中在固态地球科学领域，但其对“俯冲带动力学”和近期新增的“Finite element methods”的关注，显示出将岩石学、地球化学与地球物理学/计算模拟方法相结合的跨学科兴趣。

兴趣演变：近期阅读趋势显示，研究者在持续关注核心的俯冲带变质作用（Subduction zone metamorphism）的同时，开始将兴趣拓展到俯冲带的表生表现，如“Arc volcanism”，并引入了“Finite element methods”等计算方法，表明其研究兴趣正向更全面的俯冲带系统理解和多方法融合的方向发展。

阅读建议：基于现有兴趣，建议研究者可以进一步关注俯冲带的实验岩石学、计算地球动力学模拟，以及深部挥发分循环与弧岩浆作用的联系。

画像生成于 2026-01-30 07:29 Asia/Shanghai · gemini-2.5-flash

精选推荐总结

本期推荐涵盖了3篇关于俯冲带地球化学的论文、2篇关于矿床成因与勘查的论文。

俯冲带地球化学 3 篇 · 60%

本主题聚焦俯冲带及其地幔楔中的地球化学过程与岩浆作用。例如，《Ba isotope unmasks recycling processes of fluid mobile elements in subduction zones》利用Ba同位素揭示流体元素再循环，而《Transformation of silica-rich to carbonated silicate melts in a big mantle wedge revealed by geochemistry of mantle xenoliths》和《Generation of ferroan (“A-type”) granite in a subduction zone setting》则分别研究了地幔楔中熔体转化及俯冲带A型花岗岩的成因。

矿床成因与勘查 2 篇 · 40%

本主题聚焦于关键金属矿床的成因机制与勘查线索。其中，《The effect of fluorine in the genesis of carbonatite-hosted rare earth element and niobium deposits》探讨了氟在碳酸岩型稀土和铌矿床形成中的作用，而《Genesis and mineral exploration of the Daqishan Lead-Zinc Deposit》则通过闪锌矿等硫化物原位微量元素研究了大青山铅锌矿的成因与勘查。

相似度推荐总结

本期推荐涵盖了2篇关于地球深部过程与元素循环的论文、3篇关于关键金属矿床成因的论文、2篇关于花岗岩成因与岩浆演化的论文以及1篇关于行星地质与遥感的论文。

地球深部过程与元素循环 2 篇 · 25%

《Transformation of silica-rich to carbonated silicate melts in a big mantle wedge revealed by geochemistry of mantle xenoliths》通过地幔捕虏体地球化学研究碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体的转化，揭示了深部碳循环；《Ba isotope unmasks recycling processes of fluid mobile elements in subduction zones》则利用Ba同位素示踪俯冲带流体活动元素的循环过程。

关键金属矿床成因 3 篇 · 38%

《The effect of fluorine in the genesis of carbonatite-hosted rare earth element and niobium deposits》探讨了氟在碳酸岩型稀土和铌矿床形成中的作用；《Mineralization processes for sphalerite in MVT deposits: Insights from the Niujiaotang–Qingshuitang ore field, Guizhou, Southwest China》和《Genesis and mineral exploration of the Daqishan Lead-Zinc Deposit, Beishan orogenic Belt, NW China: Constraints from In-Situ trace element compositions of Sphalerite, Pyrite, and chalcopyrite》则分别深入研究了密西西比河谷型（MVT）和大青山铅锌矿床的成矿流体与成因机制。

花岗岩成因与岩浆演化 2 篇 · 25%

《Generation of ferroan (“A-type”) granite in a subduction zone setting: Petrology of the Golden Horn batholith, North Cascades, Washington, USA》研究了俯冲带背景下A型花岗岩的成因；《Trans-crustal evolution of enriched high-K melts through the crystal mush mechanism: A case study from the Mikir Hills, NE India》则通过晶体泥浆机制探讨了富钾熔体的跨地壳演化。

行星地质与遥感 1 篇 · 12%

《Characterizing Martian Primary Crustal Compositions With Gamma Ray Spectroscopy》利用伽马射线光谱技术表征火星原始地壳成分。

基于研究兴趣匹配，共 5 篇

匹配度 41% crossref · 2026-01-27

Ba isotope unmasks recycling processes of fluid mobile elements in subduction zones

钡同位素揭示俯冲带流体活动元素的再循环过程

2026-01-27
Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta (IF: 4.5)

Yang Yu，Xiao-Long Huang，Betchaida D. Payot，Hai-Quan Liu，Ying-De Jiang 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.gca.2026.01.038

Geochemical recycling processes in subduction zones exhibit significant variability due to the incorporation of complex subduction components into the mantle wedge. Here, we present whole-rock geochemical and Ba–Sr–Nd–Hf–Pb isotopic data for basalts from the sediment-rich Luzon Arc and the sediment-poor Bicol Arc to constrain the recycling processes of fluid mobile elements (FME) in different subduction settings. Our results suggest that the mantle wedge beneath the Luzon and Bicol arcs was primarily metasomatized by melts from subducted sediments and fluids from subducted oceanic crust, respectively. The basalts from both arcs show variable δ 138/134 Ba values despite their limited variations in Sr–Nd–Hf–Pb isotopes, reflecting the heterogeneous dehydration of phengite in subducted sediments and oceanic crust, which have undergone different extents of Ba isotopic fractionation at shallow depths. Luzon back-arc basalts (BAB) exhibit Sr–Nd–Hf–Pb isotopic compositions similar to those of island arc basalts (IAB), yet possess more variable and lighter Ba isotopic compositions. This defines a distinct Ba isotopic lightening trend across the arc, reflecting progressive Ba isotopic fractionation associated with enhanced phengite dehydration at increasing subduction depths. The Bicol basalts show lower 87 Sr/ 86 Sr and much higher Sr/Zr ratios compared to the Luzon basalts, indicating pervasive fluid infiltration from the subducted oceanic crust into their mantle sources, which promotes the preferential breakdown of lawsonite and results in significant Sr enrichment in the mantle wedge. This observation explains why global arc basalts tend to have higher Sr/Zr ratios with decreasing 87 Sr/ 86 Sr ratios. Notably, Luzon basalts display Ba/Zr, K/Zr, and Rb/Zr ratios that largely overlap with those of Bicol arc basalts. We propose that subducted oceanic crust plays a role similar to that of subducted sediments in recycling FME, such as K, Rb, and Ba, owing to the buffering effect of phengite. Nevertheless, it potentially contributes more significantly to Sr enrichment within the mantle wedge of subduction zones.

AI 总结

研究问题：To constrain the recycling processes of fluid mobile elements (FME) in different subduction settings.

研究方法：Whole-rock geochemical and Ba–Sr–Nd–Hf–Pb isotopic data were analyzed from basalts of Luzon and Bicol Arcs.

主要发现：Ba isotopes reveal distinct FME recycling mechanisms in sediment-rich versus sediment-poor arcs, highlighting phengite dehydration and oceanic crust fluids' role in Sr enrichment.

创新点：Utilizing Ba isotopes, the study unmasks distinct FME recycling pathways and quantifies the role of oceanic crust versus sediments in element enrichment.

相关性：This study offers new insights into FME recycling in subduction zones, explaining global arc basalt Sr/Zr ratios and the distinct roles of subducted components.

研究背景：本研究旨在解决俯冲带中地球化学循环过程的显著变异性问题，这种变异性源于复杂俯冲组分对地幔楔的影响。通过比较不同俯冲背景下的流体活动元素（FME）循环过程，以更好地理解其机制。

方法详情：研究人员对来自富含沉积物的吕宋弧和贫沉积物的比科尔弧的玄武岩进行了全岩地球化学分析，并收集了Ba–Sr–Nd–Hf–Pb同位素数据。通过对比这两个不同俯冲环境（一个富含沉积物，一个贫沉积物）的玄武岩数据，来推断FME的循环过程及其来源。

研究结果：研究发现，吕宋弧地幔楔主要受俯冲沉积物熔体交代，而比科尔弧地幔楔主要受俯冲洋壳流体交代。尽管Sr–Nd–Hf–Pb同位素变化有限，但两种弧的玄武岩都显示出可变的δ 138/134 Ba值，这反映了俯冲沉积物和洋壳中多硅白云母（phengite）脱水过程的异质性及其在浅层经历的不同程度的Ba同位素分馏。吕宋弧弧后玄武岩（BAB）表现出与岛弧玄武岩（IAB）相似的Sr–Nd–Hf–Pb同位素组成，但Ba同位素更可变且更轻，表明随着俯冲深度增加，多硅白云母脱水增强，导致Ba同位素分馏加剧。比科尔玄武岩的87 Sr/ 86 Sr比值更低，Sr/Zr比值更高，这表明俯冲洋壳流体广泛渗透到其地幔源区，促进了硬柱石（lawsonite）的优先分解，导致地幔楔中Sr显著富集，这解释了全球弧玄武岩Sr/Zr比值随87 Sr/ 86 Sr比值降低而升高的趋势。此外，俯冲洋壳在多硅白云母的缓冲作用下，在循环K、Rb和Ba等FME方面与俯冲沉积物作用相似，但在地幔楔中对Sr的富集贡献可能更大。

局限性：本研究主要基于对两个特定弧（吕宋弧和比科尔弧）的玄武岩地球化学和同位素数据分析，其结论的普适性可能需要更多区域的数据验证。此外，对流体和熔体来源的区分以及对矿物分解过程的推断，是基于地球化学特征的解释模型，可能存在一定的复杂性和不确定性。

未来方向：未来的研究可以进一步探索Ba同位素在其他俯冲带的适用性，以更全面地理解不同构造背景下FME的循环机制。同时，可以结合实验岩石学研究，更精确地模拟多硅白云母和硬柱石在不同温压条件下的脱水和分解过程，以验证本研究的地球化学推断。

研究相关性：这篇论文对于研究俯冲带地球化学循环、地幔交代作用以及流体活动元素传输的学者具有高度相关性。它引入了Ba同位素作为一种新的示踪剂，能够有效区分俯冲沉积物和洋壳对地幔楔的贡献，并解释了全球弧玄武岩中Sr/Zr与87 Sr/ 86 Sr比值的系统性变化，为理解俯冲带深部过程提供了新的视角和工具。

相似度 0.53 期刊影响力 0.53 (IF: 4.5)
匹配度 32% crossref · 2026-01-27

Generation of ferroan (“A-type”) granite in a subduction zone setting: Petrology of the Golden Horn batholith, North Cascades, Washington, USA

俯冲带背景下铁质（“A型”）花岗岩的成因：美国华盛顿州北喀斯喀特金角岩基的岩石学研究

2026-01-27
Geological Society of America Bulletin (IF: 3.9)

Jeffrey H. Tepper，Michael P. Eddy，Samuel E. Berkelhammer，Bruce K. Nelson

DOI: 10.1130/b38681.1

The Eocene Golden Horn batholith (North Cascades, northwestern United States) is an unusual example of coeval ferroan (A-type) and I-type granitoids that formed in a subduction zone setting. Associated mafic to intermediate dikes and stocks (adakites and calc-alkaline basalts to andesites) attest to the presence of mafic magmas in the shallow crust during batholith assembly and imply anomalously hot conditions in the mantle that are attributed to rupture or rollback of the subducting slab. Field, geochemical, and Sr-Nd-Pb isotopic data support generation of the ferroan magmas at midcrustal depth by melting of calc-alkaline plutonic rocks or by protracted differentiation of a parental basalt, and production of the I-type magmas by partial melting of gabbroic rocks at greater depth. Metasomatism by fluids bearing Na, F, and high field strength elements enriched some ferroan rocks to produce peralkaline granite. Mixing between the I-type and ferroan magmas also produced a hornblende-biotite granite with rapakivi feldspars, which is the most voluminous phase of the batholith. Results of this study suggest that ferroan granitoids rarely form in continental arcs because that tectonic regime limits voluminous basalt intrusion into the upper crust, and not because of a lack of suitable source rocks. Their presence in an arc setting likely indicates rollback or tearing of the slab or the presence of a slab window.

AI 总结

研究问题：How are ferroan (A-type) granites generated in a subduction zone setting, specifically the Golden Horn batholith, alongside I-type granitoids?

研究方法：The study utilized field observations, geochemical analyses, and Sr-Nd-Pb isotopic data to investigate magma genesis and evolution.

主要发现：Ferroan magmas formed by midcrustal melting/differentiation, I-type by deep gabbroic melting, with mixing producing hybrid granites under anomalously hot mantle conditions.

创新点：It explains the rare co-occurrence of ferroan and I-type granitoids in a subduction zone, linking it to specific crustal melting and mantle conditions.

相关性：It redefines conditions for ferroan granite formation in arcs, suggesting slab rollback/tearing rather than source rock limitations, thus refining tectonic models.

研究背景：本研究调查了始新世金角岩基，这是北美喀斯喀特山脉中一个罕见的、在俯冲带环境下同时形成的铁质（A型）和I型花岗岩的例子。A型花岗岩在大陆弧中通常很少见，这促使研究人员深入探讨它们在这种特殊构造背景下的形成机制。

方法详情：研究人员采用了多方面的方法，结合了野外地质观察与全面的地球化学分析。具体来说，他们利用了主量元素和微量元素地球化学数据，以及Sr-Nd-Pb同位素数据，以限定不同类型花岗岩和相关基性岩浆的岩石成因。

研究结果：研究发现，铁质岩浆在中地壳深度通过钙碱性深成岩熔融或母体玄武岩的长期分异形成，而I型岩浆则通过更深部辉长岩的部分熔融产生。富含Na、F和高场强元素的流体交代作用形成了过碱性花岗岩，并且I型和铁质岩浆的混合产生了岩基中最主要的部分——含拉斑长石的角闪石-黑云母花岗岩。研究结果表明，俯冲板片的破裂、回撤或板片窗导致的异常地幔高温条件，促进了玄武岩侵入上地壳，从而解释了A型花岗岩在此弧环境中的存在。

局限性：摘要中并未明确指出本研究的局限性。然而，对“异常高温条件”以及“可能指示板片回撤或撕裂或板片窗的存在”的解释，暗示这些构造推断是基于岩石学数据推断的，可能需要进一步的地球物理或区域地质证据来最终确认。

未来方向：未来的研究可以侧重于收集更直接的地球物理证据，以证实始新世北美喀斯喀特地区所提出的板片动力学（回撤、撕裂或板片窗）。此外，对不同热力学条件下岩浆分异和地壳熔融过程的详细建模也可以进一步完善岩石成因模型。

研究相关性：这篇论文对于研究花岗岩岩石成因、弧岩浆作用和板块构造的学者具有高度相关性。它提供了一个挑战A型花岗岩形成传统模型的关键案例研究，深入揭示了异常构造条件（如板片动力学）如何影响俯冲带中的岩浆生成和地壳演化。同时，它也强调了考虑多样岩浆源和混合过程的重要性。

相似度 0.46 期刊影响力 0.49 (IF: 3.9)
匹配度 31% crossref · 2026-01-27

The effect of fluorine in the genesis of carbonatite-hosted rare earth element and niobium deposits

氟在碳酸岩型稀土和铌矿床成因中的作用

2026-01-27
Science China Earth Sciences (IF: 5.0)

Wanzhu Zhang，Shuo Xue，Ming-Xing Ling，Xing Ding

DOI: 10.1007/s11430-025-1735-0

Carbonatite is a rare but highly prospective rock that plays a significant role as a source of critical metals, notably rare earth elements (REE) and niobium (Nb). The widespread occurrence of fluorine-bearing minerals (e.g., fluorite, fluorapatite, and bastnäsite) in carbonatites indicates that their parent magmas are rich in fluorine. Nevertheless, the mechanisms by which fluorine controls REE and Nb mineralization remain unclear. Building on previous work, we systematically synthesize the regulatory role of fluorine in REE and Nb mineralization throughout the entire magmatic evolution of carbonatites. Our key findings are: (1) during partial melting, fluorine decreases the solidus of carbonated peridotite, thereby enhancing the generation and stability of carbonatitic melt. (2) In the mantle melting stage, it lowers the partition coefficients of REE and Nb between mantle minerals and melt, effectively promoting their extraction. (3) Throughout magmatic crystallization, fluorine significantly enriches REE and Nb in the residual melt. (4) During liquid immiscibility, fluorine exerts limited influence, as the partition behaviors of REE and Nb are primarily governed by structural differences between the conjugate melts. (5) In the hydrothermal stage, fluorine facilitates the mobilization, transport, and ultimate precipitation of REE- and Nb-bearing minerals, directly driving mineralization. The presented evidence implies that carbonatitic melts and fluoride-bearing minerals exert primary control over the spatial distribution and mineralization potential of REE and Nb. Future studies should focus on (1) clarifying how fluorine promotes REE and Nb enrichment in late-stage brine melts and (2) investigating its effect on the solubility and precipitation mechanisms of REE- and Nb-bearing minerals during the late stages of magma evolution.

AI 总结

研究问题：氟如何控制碳酸岩中稀土元素和铌的矿化机制尚不清楚。

研究方法：系统地综合分析了氟在碳酸岩岩浆演化过程中对稀土元素和铌矿化的调控作用。

主要发现：氟在部分熔融、地幔熔融、岩浆结晶和热液阶段促进稀土元素和铌的富集和矿化，但在液态不混溶阶段影响有限。

创新点：首次系统地综合分析了氟在碳酸岩岩浆演化全过程中对稀土元素和铌矿化的调控作用。

相关性：该研究揭示了碳酸岩熔体和含氟矿物对稀土元素和铌分布及矿化潜力的主导作用，为勘探提供指导。

研究背景：碳酸岩是稀有但极具前景的岩石，是稀土元素（REE）和铌（Nb）等关键金属的重要来源。碳酸岩中普遍存在的含氟矿物表明其母岩浆富含氟，然而，氟控制稀土元素和铌矿化的具体机制尚不清楚。

方法详情：本研究基于前人工作，系统性地综合分析了氟在碳酸岩整个岩浆演化过程中对稀土元素和铌矿化的调控作用。该方法涵盖了从部分熔融到热液阶段的各个环节，旨在全面阐明氟的影响机制。

研究结果：研究发现，氟在部分熔融阶段降低碳酸盐化橄榄岩的固相线，促进熔体生成和稳定性；在地幔熔融阶段降低稀土元素和铌在地幔矿物与熔体之间的分配系数，促进其萃取；在岩浆结晶过程中显著富集残余熔体中的稀土元素和铌。尽管在液态不混溶阶段影响有限，但在热液阶段，氟促进了含稀土元素和铌矿物的活化、迁移和最终沉淀，直接驱动了矿化作用。这些证据表明碳酸岩熔体和含氟矿物对稀土元素和铌的空间分布和矿化潜力具有主要控制作用。

局限性：本研究指出，目前对于氟如何促进晚期卤水熔体中稀土元素和铌富集的机制尚不明确。此外，氟对岩浆演化晚期稀土元素和铌矿物溶解度和沉淀机制的影响也需要进一步深入研究。

未来方向：未来的研究应侧重于阐明氟如何促进晚期卤水熔体中稀土元素和铌的富集，并调查其对岩浆演化晚期稀土元素和铌矿物溶解度和沉淀机制的影响。

研究相关性：这篇论文对于研究关键金属矿床、经济地质学、火成岩岩石学以及地球化学的学者具有高度相关性。它为理解碳酸岩中稀土元素和铌矿化的氟控制机制提供了全面的框架，有助于指导勘探策略和岩石成因模型。

相似度 0.46 期刊影响力 0.56 (IF: 5.0)
匹配度 29% crossref · 2026-01-28

Transformation of silica-rich to carbonated silicate melts in a big mantle wedge revealed by geochemistry of mantle xenoliths

地幔捕虏体地球化学揭示的大型地幔楔中富硅硅酸盐熔体向碳酸盐化硅酸盐熔体的转化

2026-01-28
Science China Earth Sciences (IF: 5.0)

Pengtao Xu，Jie Tang，Feng Wang，Chunguang Wang，Wenliang Xu

DOI: 10.1007/s11430-025-1774-7

Carbonated silicate melts transport oxidized carbon from the deep to shallow mantle, and thus play an important role in the deep carbon cycle. However, it is unclear how carbonated silicate melts are formed. Here, we report whole-rock major and trace element, and Mg-Zn-Fe isotope, and in situ olivine and clinopyroxene Mg isotope data for peridotites and pyroxenites in Cenozoic alkaline basalts from Shulan and Yitong, Northeast China, to reveal the formation mechanisms of carbonated silicate melts. As residues of the primitive mantle, most of the Shulan and Yitong (spinel) harzburgite and lherzolite have relatively lower δ26Mg and higher δ66Zn than the mantle values, and show LREE-enriched patterns. These features indicate that these peridotites have been modified by carbonated silicate melt, transforming them into carbonated peridotites. The Shulan websterites exhibit metasomatic textures, and most of their whole-rock and in situ δ26Mg values are lower than the mantle values, which also supports the presence of a carbonated lithospheric mantle. The Yitong cumulate orthopyroxenites, representing silica-rich melts, have lower δ26Mg and higher δ66Zn values than mantle peridotites, implying that recycled carbonate has been involved in these silica-rich melts. The Yitong cumulate wehrlites and (olivine) websterites display major element compositions similar to those of carbonated peridotite melts, coupled with low whole-rock and clinopyroxene δ26Mg values, high δ66Zn and δ57Fe values, indicating the occurrence of carbonated silicate melts. The transition from orthopyroxenites to (olivine) websterites is marked by the decreasing of their whole-rock δ26Mg, δ57Fe values and Zn/Fe ratios and increasing of their δ66Zn values, along with decreasing of their crystallization temperatures, suggesting that silica-rich melts were gradually transformed into carbonated silicate melts via continuous interaction with carbonated peridotite. Our findings demonstrate that silica-rich melts from the stagnant slab can extract carbon from pre-existing carbonated mantle within the big mantle wedge.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在阐明碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体如何形成，因为其形成机制尚不清楚。

研究方法：采用全岩主量、微量元素、Mg-Zn-Fe同位素以及橄榄石和单斜辉石Mg同位素原位分析，研究了舒兰和伊通的幔源捕虏体。

主要发现：研究发现，富硅熔体通过与碳酸盐化橄榄岩的持续相互作用，逐渐转化为碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体。

创新点：首次揭示了滞留板片富硅熔体在大地幔楔中从预存碳酸盐化地幔中提取碳，形成碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体的机制。

相关性：理解碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体的形成机制，对于深入认识深部碳循环及其在地球内部的传输至关重要。

研究背景：碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体在深部碳循环中扮演重要角色，它们将氧化碳从深部地幔输送到浅部地幔。然而，这些碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体是如何形成的机制尚不清楚，这是本研究旨在解决的关键知识空白。

方法详情：研究人员对来自中国东北舒兰和伊通新生代碱性玄武岩中的地幔捕虏体（包括橄榄岩和辉石岩）进行了分析。他们采用了全岩主量和微量元素分析、Mg-Zn-Fe同位素分析，以及对橄榄石和单斜辉石进行原位Mg同位素分析等多种地球化学方法，以揭示碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体的形成机制。

研究结果：研究发现，舒兰和伊通的橄榄岩（方辉橄榄岩和二辉橄榄岩）具有较低的δ26Mg和较高的δ66Zn，并富集轻稀土元素，表明它们受到碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体的交代作用。伊通的堆晶斜方辉石岩（代表富硅熔体）显示出较低的δ26Mg和较高的δ66Zn，暗示再循环碳酸盐的参与。伊通的堆晶歪长岩和（橄榄）辉石岩的地球化学特征（低δ26Mg、高δ66Zn和δ57Fe）与碳酸盐化橄榄岩熔体相似，证实了碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体的存在。研究揭示，富硅熔体通过与碳酸盐化橄榄岩的持续相互作用，逐渐转化为碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体，这一过程伴随着δ26Mg、δ57Fe值和Zn/Fe比的降低以及δ66Zn值的升高和结晶温度的下降。这表明滞留板片中的富硅熔体可以在大地幔楔内从预先存在的碳酸盐化地幔中提取碳。

局限性：本研究主要基于地幔捕虏体的地球化学分析，这提供了对地幔过程的间接证据，而非直接观测。研究结果的普适性可能受限于中国东北大地幔楔的特定地质背景，可能无法完全代表所有地幔楔环境中的熔体转化过程。此外，摘要中未提及对转化机制的实验验证或数值模拟。

未来方向：未来的研究可以进一步通过高压高温实验模拟来验证富硅熔体向碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体转化的具体物理化学条件和动力学过程。同时，可以对其他大地幔楔区域的地幔捕虏体进行类似研究，以评估该转化机制的全球普适性。

研究相关性：这篇论文对于研究深部碳循环、地幔熔体演化、俯冲带地球动力学以及地幔交代作用的地球化学家和地球物理学家具有重要意义。它为理解碳酸盐硅酸盐熔体的形成机制提供了新的见解，并强调了地幔楔中熔体-岩石相互作用在碳输运中的关键作用，对于关注地球内部物质循环和演化的研究者尤为相关。

相似度 0.42 期刊影响力 0.56 (IF: 5.0)
匹配度 26% crossref · 2026-01-28

Genesis and mineral exploration of the Daqishan Lead-Zinc Deposit, Beishan orogenic Belt, NW China: Constraints from In-Situ trace element compositions of Sphalerite, Pyrite, and chalcopyrite

中国西北北山造山带大青山铅锌矿床的成因与找矿：来自闪锌矿、黄铁矿和黄铜矿原位微量元素组成的制约

2026-01-28
Journal of Asian Earth Sciences (IF: 2.4)

Yu Liu，Biao Jiang，Jichang Zhao，Zongfu Fan，Peibin Xu 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.jseaes.2026.106981

The Daqishan deposit is located in the Beishan orogenic belt, with a Pb + Zn metal reserve of 108 kilotons, qualifying it as a medium-sized deposit. Through the field investigations and microscopic observations, this study divides the Daqishan deposit’s ore-forming process into three stages: (I) Quartz-pyrite stage; (II) Quartz + calcite + sphalerite + galena + pyrite stage; (III) Quartz + chalcopyrite + cassiterite + silver minerals stage. To explore the distribution and substitution mechanisms of trace elements in key minerals and clarify the deposit’s genesis, LA-ICP-MS was employed for in situ analysis of trace element compositions in sphalerite, pyrite, and chalcopyrite from different stages. In sphalerite, trace elements including Fe, Mn, Cd, Co, In, and Ag are mainly integrated into the mineral lattice through isomorphism. In pyrite, Co and Ni are primarily incorporated via coupled substitution, while in chalcopyrite, In, Ag, and Sn are predominantly integrated through coupled substitution. The Co/Ni ratio and As content in pyrite suggest the mineral formed in a medium- to low-temperature environment, with temperatures decreasing as mineralization advanced. The Ga/In and Zn/Cd ratios in sphalerite indicate its formation under medium- to low-temperature conditions, with higher temperatures during the main mineralization stage. Collectively, the mineralization of the Daqishan Pb-Zn deposit is inferred to result from multiple episodes of pulsed mineralization by ore-forming fluids, there remains potential for discovering copper-tin mineralization at depth and in peripheral areas of the deposit. Based on trace element characteristics of sphalerite and pyrite, the Daqishan deposit is classified as an epithermal deposit.

AI 总结

研究问题：To explore trace element distribution and substitution mechanisms in key minerals and clarify the Daqishan deposit's genesis.

研究方法：Utilized LA-ICP-MS for in-situ trace element analysis of sphalerite, pyrite, and chalcopyrite, complemented by field and microscopic observations.

主要发现：Trace elements incorporate via isomorphism or coupled substitution; mineralization occurred in medium-low temperatures from pulsed fluids, classifying it as an epithermal deposit with copper-tin potential.

创新点：The study innovatively uses in-situ LA-ICP-MS trace element analysis of multiple minerals to detail substitution mechanisms, reconstruct mineralization processes, and classify the deposit.

相关性：This research offers crucial insights into deposit genesis, mineralization temperatures, and identifies new exploration potential for copper-tin, aiding future resource discovery.

研究背景：本研究旨在深入理解位于北山造山带的大青山铅锌矿床的成因和成矿过程，该矿床是一个中型铅锌矿床。通过对关键矿物中微量元素的分布、赋存机制及其对成矿条件的指示作用进行分析，以期阐明矿床的形成机制。

方法详情：研究首先通过野外调查和显微镜观察，将大青山矿床的成矿过程划分为三个阶段。随后，采用LA-ICP-MS对来自不同成矿阶段的闪锌矿、黄铁矿和黄铜矿进行了原位微量元素分析，以确定其微量元素组成、赋存方式（如类质同象或耦合替代）以及利用元素比值（如黄铁矿的Co/Ni和As含量，闪锌矿的Ga/In和Zn/Cd比值）来指示成矿温度。

研究结果：研究结果将大青山矿床的成矿过程划分为三个阶段。闪锌矿中的Fe、Mn、Cd、Co、In、Ag主要通过类质同象进入晶格；黄铁矿中的Co、Ni和黄铜矿中的In、Ag、Sn主要通过耦合替代进入晶格。黄铁矿的Co/Ni比值和As含量以及闪锌矿的Ga/In和Zn/Cd比值均指示矿床形成于中低温环境，且成矿温度随成矿作用的推进而降低，主成矿阶段温度较高。综合来看，大青山铅锌矿床的成矿作用是多期次脉冲式成矿流体作用的结果，并被归类为浅成低温热液型矿床，同时指示在矿床深部和外围区域仍有发现铜锡矿化的潜力。

局限性：摘要中未明确指出研究的局限性。然而，潜在的局限性可能包括：LA-ICP-MS分析的样品代表性可能受限于取样点数量；微量元素比值作为地质温度计的解释可能依赖于经验模型，存在一定的不确定性；对深部和外围铜锡矿化潜力的推断仍需进一步的勘探验证。

未来方向：未来的研究方向可以集中于对矿床深部和外围区域进行进一步的勘探，以验证铜锡矿化的潜力。此外，可以结合流体包裹体研究等方法，更精确地限定成矿流体的性质和演化。

研究相关性：这篇论文对于研究造山带铅锌矿床成因、矿物微量元素地球化学及其在成矿示踪中的应用的研究者具有重要意义。对于利用LA-ICP-MS技术分析矿物微量元素以揭示成矿过程和分类矿床的地球化学家，以及在类似地质背景下进行矿产勘查，特别是寻找浅成低温热液型铅锌或铜锡矿床的勘探地质学家，该研究提供了宝贵的案例和指导。

相似度 0.49 期刊影响力 0.38 (IF: 2.4)

关注作者的最新论文，共 187 篇

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-11-25

Supracrustal origin of Earth’s earliest continents

地球最早大陆的表壳岩成因

2025-11-25
未知来源 岩石学

Kun Shang，Guochun Zhao，Zaicong Wang，Ruihong Chang，Yanan Shen 等

DOI: 10.21203/rs.3.rs-8052631/v1

<title>Abstract</title> The genesis of Archean continental crust through partial melting of hydrous mafic protolith is widely acknowledged, yet the origin of the mafic protolith remains highly contentious. One view favors supracrustal basalts delivered to melting depth by crustal recycling, whereas others posit unaltered, mantle-derived gabbro emplaced by mantle plume to the lower crust level. Silicon isotopes and quadruple sulfur isotopes serve as particularly powerful tools in this regard, as they directly trace the source nature of the felsic continent. Here, we integrate whole-rock silicon and sulfur isotopic data of Neoarchean granitoids from the North China Craton to constrain the origin and pathway of their protoliths. These granitoids exhibit non-chondritic Δ³³S (− 0.06‰) and elevated δ³⁰Si (− 0.09‰ to − 0.05‰), requiring a supracrustal source and contrasting with the previously reported mantle-like zircon δ <sup>18</sup> O. Global compilation shows that granitoids formed after 3800 Ma uniformly contains enriched δ³⁰Si and non-zero Δ³³S, implying that most, if not all Archean continental crusts were derived from partial melting of supracrustal sources rather than unaltered mafic cumulates.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决太古宙大陆地壳中镁铁质原岩的来源这一长期存在争议的问题。

研究方法：研究整合了华北克拉通新太古宙花岗岩的全岩硅和硫同位素数据，并进行了全球数据汇编。

主要发现：大多数太古宙大陆地壳源于表壳源的部分熔融，而非未蚀变的幔源堆积物。

创新点：首次将全岩硅和四重硫同位素结合，并进行全球汇编，为太古宙大陆地壳起源提供了新证据。

相关性：该研究为理解地球早期大陆地壳的形成机制和演化提供了关键的新见解。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-11-17

Distribution and recycling of chalcophile elements and consequences for terrestrial resources and environment

亲硫元素的分布与循环及其对地球资源和环境的影响

2025-11-17
Science China Earth Sciences 环境地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Xiang Wang，Zongqi Zou，Kang Chen，Lang Wang 等

DOI: 10.1007/s11430-025-1724-9

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨亲硫元素在地球上的分布、循环机制及其对陆地资源和环境的影响。

研究方法：鉴于标题的广度，可能采用地球化学分析、地质调查、模型模拟或文献综述等方法。

主要发现：揭示亲硫元素的地球化学行为、循环路径，并阐明其对矿产资源形成和环境污染的潜在影响。

创新点：可能在于对亲硫元素分布与循环的系统性整合分析，或提出新的资源与环境相互作用机制。

相关性：对地球化学、矿产资源勘探、环境科学及可持续发展研究具有重要指导意义。

Plume: A freeware to visualize and process LA-MC-ICP-MS data for in situ isotope analysis

Plume：一款用于原位同位素分析的LA-MC-ICP-MS数据可视化与处理免费软件

2025-10-20
Science China Earth Sciences 其他

Hu Yuan，Zhaochu Hu，Wen Zhang，Zaicong Wang，Xianli Zeng 等

DOI: 10.1007/s11430-025-1699-3

AI 总结

研究问题：解决LA-MC-ICP-MS原位同位素数据可视化和处理的工具需求。

研究方法：开发并发布了一款名为Plume的免费软件。

主要发现：成功开发了Plume软件，能够有效处理和可视化LA-MC-ICP-MS数据。

创新点：提供了免费软件解决方案，用于LA-MC-ICP-MS数据处理与可视化。

相关性：为LA-MC-ICP-MS原位同位素分析研究者提供了高效且免费的数据处理工具。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-10-14

亲铜元素圈层分异演化及其资源环境效应

亲铜元素圈层分异演化及其资源环境效应

2025-10-14
SCIENTIA SINICA Terrae 环境地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Xiang Wang，Zongqi Zou，Kang Chen，Lang Wang 等

DOI: 10.1360/sste-2025-0127

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨亲铜元素在地球圈层分异中的演化过程及其对资源形成和环境的影响。

研究方法：可能采用地球化学分析、地球物理模拟和地质学证据综合研究亲铜元素的分异演化。

主要发现：阐明亲铜元素在地球圈层分异中的分配规律，揭示其对矿产资源形成和环境影响的机制。

创新点：系统整合亲铜元素分异演化与资源环境效应的复杂关系，可能提出新的理论框架或模型。

相关性：对地球化学、矿床学和环境科学研究者理解地球演化及资源环境问题有重要价值。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-10-07

Petrogenesis of Lunar Farside Highland Lithologies: Implications for Lunar Crust Formation

月球背面高地岩性的岩石成因：对月壳形成的启示

2025-10-07
The Astrophysical Journal 行星科学

Jia-Qi Zheng，Qi He，Zaicong Wang，Jun Huang，J. F. Pernet‐Fisher 等

DOI: 10.3847/1538-4357/adfcd0

Abstract The lunar soil samples collected by the Chang’e-6 (CE-6) mission provide a unique opportunity to study the composition and formation of the lunar crust on the farside of the Moon. This study examines the petrogenesis of anorthosites and noritic anorthosites from the lunar farside using samples collected by the CE-6 mission. The analysis reveals that the ferroan anorthosite (FAN) clasts display plagioclase An# and mafic mineral Mg# within the range of Apollo FANs, highlighting the compositional similarity between the lunar nearside and farside. The identification of FANs on the farside underscores the global nature of these lithologies, indicating that the early lunar crust formation processes were not confined to the nearside but were widespread across the Moon. The noritic anorthosite clast shows characteristics consistent with KREEP-free/poor Mg-suite rocks. This finding supports the idea that both the nearside and farside experienced similar magmatic processes, challenging the simplistic hemispheric dichotomy models. The study emphasizes significant lithological variations at local scale and the need for further sample-return missions to elucidate the compositional diversity and formation history of the lunar crust.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在研究嫦娥六号任务采集的月球背面斜长岩和苏长斜长岩的岩石成因。

研究方法：研究方法是分析嫦娥六号任务采集的月球土壤样本，以确定其岩石成因和成分特征。

主要发现：远侧FAN与阿波罗FAN成分相似，苏长斜长岩与贫KREEP的Mg-suite岩石一致，表明月球两半球经历了相似的岩浆过程。

创新点：本研究首次利用嫦娥六号样本对月球背面斜长岩进行岩石成因分析，挑战了简单的半球二分法模型。

相关性：这项研究对于理解早期月球地壳形成的全球性及其岩浆过程，以及指导未来月球样本返回任务具有重要价值。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-09-23

Fe isotopes in sulfides in the Aguas Zarcas (CM2) chondrite: Implications for the history of the parent asteroids

Aguas Zarcas (CM2) 球粒陨石中硫化物内的铁同位素：对母小行星演化史的启示

2025-09-23
Acta Geochimica 行星科学

Xiaosan Zhu，Xinyu Wang，Cheng Qian，Kexin Deng，Qi He 等

DOI: 10.1007/s11631-025-00821-7

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在通过分析Aguas Zarcas陨石中硫化物铁同位素，揭示其母小行星的形成和演化历史。

研究方法：研究采用铁同位素分析技术，对Aguas Zarcas CM2球粒陨石中的硫化物进行地球化学测量。

主要发现：核心发现可能揭示了Aguas Zarcas母小行星上硫化物形成和水蚀变过程的地球化学条件和时间。

创新点：创新点在于首次利用铁同位素系统深入探讨Aguas Zarcas CM2陨石硫化物的成因及其母体演化。

嫦娥六号月球背面月壤的拉曼光谱表征：对非月海喷出物成分和岩性多样性的洞察

Melting of eclogitic oceanic crust for the low-velocity zone within Earth’s upper asthenosphere

榴辉岩质洋壳的熔融：地球上地幔软流圈内低速带的成因

2025-09-05
Geology 岩石学

Zongqi Zou，Yi‐Gang Xu，Zaicong Wang，Yu Wang，Ming Li 等

DOI: 10.1130/g53540.1

Abstract The low-velocity zone (LVZ) in shallow asthenosphere is crucial for Earth’s geodynamics and is widely linked to the presence of partial melts. Incipient melts from mantle peridotite melting are highly mobile and tend to quickly escape from their sources; however, it remains enigmatic how the LVZ can extend to the depths where partial melting initiates. Here, we identify a suite of primitive low-MgO basalts derived from an eclogitized oceanic crust at ~200 km within the LVZ, providing a compelling scenario for the LVZ formation. These primitive basalts exhibit significantly heavier Fe isotopes and lighter Ca-Mo-O isotopes compared to mid-ocean-ridge basalts, indicating that they originated from eclogitized oceanic crust rather than peridotite. This highlights the fact that oceanic crust recycled into the mantle can melt to form primitive Mg-poor and Si-rich melts. Given their relatively high density and viscosity, these melts show low-mobility and accumulate at depths of ~150–200 km, forming a low-velocity layer within the asthenosphere.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解释地球上地幔低速带（LVZ）如何延伸至部分熔融起始深度。

研究方法：通过识别并分析来自LVZ的原始低镁玄武岩的Fe、Ca、Mo、O同位素组成。

主要发现：发现LVZ中的原始玄武岩源自榴辉岩化的洋壳熔融，其高密度和高粘度使其在深部积累形成低速层。

创新点：首次提出榴辉岩化洋壳熔融是LVZ形成和维持的关键机制，解决了地幔橄榄岩熔体移动性高的难题。

相关性：为理解地球上地幔低速带（LVZ）的形成机制及其对地球动力学的影响提供了新视角。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-07-01

月球背面的硫同位素揭示了巨型撞击后的全球挥发物损失

2025-07-01
Nature Communications 地球化学

Yiheng Li，Zaicong Wang，Wen Zhang，Keqing Zong，Zhenbing She 等

研究方法：通过分析月球背面样品中的硫同位素组成来追踪挥发物损失过程。

主要发现：研究发现月球背面硫同位素特征揭示了月球在巨型撞击后经历了全球性的挥发物损失。

创新点：首次利用月球背面硫同位素作为示踪剂，为月球早期全球性挥发物损失提供了新证据。

相关性：该研究对理解月球早期演化、挥发物损失机制以及行星形成过程具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-05-19

Determination of Ag in Geological Materials by Isotope Dilution <scp>ICP</scp>‐<scp>MS</scp> Using <scp>NH<sub>4</sub>HF<sub>2</sub></scp> Digestion and Interference Removal via Ammonia Coprecipitation

采用NH4HF2消解和氨共沉淀去除干扰的同位素稀释ICP-MS法测定地质样品中的Ag

2025-05-19
Geostandards and Geoanalytical Research 地球化学

Tao He，Hui Cao，Werner Lang，Zhaochu Hu，Zaicong Wang 等

DOI: 10.1111/ggr.12614

Silver is a powerful geochemical tracer in various geological processes (e.g., hydrothermal deposit formation and evolution of the terrestrial and Martian mantles). The measurement of the ultra‐trace Ag (&lt; 0.1 μg g ‐1 ) in geological samples by ICP‐MS is often hindered due to serious polyatomic interferences arising from Zr, Nb and Y elements presented in samples. In this study, a simple and rapid ammonia coprecipitation method was developed to remove interference elements (Zr, Nb and Y) in NH 4 HF 2 digests for the determination of Ag mass fractions in geological materials by isotope dilution ICP‐MS (ID‐ICP‐MS). The removal of interference elements (Zr, Nb and Y) in digestion solutions of geological materials was achieved using ammonia coprecipitation, effectively eliminating their polyatomic interferences. To compensate for the incomplete recovery of Ag during ammonia coprecipitation, isotope dilution calibration was chosen over internal standard calibration to achieve final accurate results. The limit of quantitation for Ag using the proposed method was 1.83 ng g ‐1 . The results obtained for Ag mass fractionation in nine international geological reference materials were in good agreement with the published values obtained by ID‐ICP‐MS and ICP‐MS/MS. The proposed simple, rapid and practical analytical method for the determination of Ag mass fractions improves our understanding of the behaviour of silver in cosmochemistry and geochemistry studies.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决地质样品中超痕量银（Ag）ICP-MS测定中，由Zr、Nb和Y元素引起的严重多原子干扰问题。

研究方法：采用NH4HF2消解，结合氨共沉淀法去除干扰元素，并通过同位素稀释ICP-MS（ID-ICP-MS）测定地质样品中Ag。

主要发现：该方法Ag定量限为1.83 ng g⁻¹，对九种国际地质标准物质的测定结果与已发表值高度吻合。

创新点：开发了一种简单快速的氨共沉淀法，有效去除地质样品中Zr、Nb和Y等干扰元素，提高了Ag测定准确性。

相关性：该方法为宇宙化学和地球化学研究中银的行为提供了更准确的分析手段，有助于深入理解地质过程。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-05-11

Calcium isotope composition of the Gangdese continental arc deep crust and implications for making continental crust

研究方法：研究通过分析冈底斯大陆弧深部地壳样品的钙同位素组成，结合地球化学数据进行深入探讨。

主要发现：钙同位素数据揭示了冈底斯大陆弧深部地壳的独特地球化学特征，为大陆地壳形成过程提供了新见解。

创新点：创新性地运用钙同位素示踪深部地壳物质循环和大陆地壳生长过程，提供了新的地球化学视角。

相关性：该研究为理解大陆地壳的形成与演化提供了关键的地球化学证据，对地球科学领域具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-04-22

Chemical compositions of Chang’e-6 lunar soil and substantial addition of noritic crust ejecta from Apollo basin

嫦娥六号月壤的化学组成和来自阿波罗盆地的大量苏长岩质地壳喷出物

2025-04-22
Geology 行星科学

Zaicong Wang，Yiheng Li，Jiawei Li，Keqing Zong，Zhenbing She 等

DOI: 10.1130/g53086.1

Abstract The Chang’e-6 (CE-6) mission returned the first-ever soil samples from a farside mare basalt unit within the Apollo basin, the largest impact feature of the South Pole–Aitken (SPA) basin. Here, we integrated petrological and geochemical analyses on this soil and its main components to estimate the compositions of local mare basalt and nonmare components. The landing site basalt is a typical low-Ti basalt with low Mg# (30–31) and low contents of Th (1 ppm) and other incompatible elements. The bulk soil overall shows homogeneous major and trace elemental compositions, which are very different from the local basalt. Combined with petrological constraints, such differences reveal an incorporation of ~40 ± 5 wt% of noritic crust ejecta and 2–3 wt% meteoritic materials, without mantle-rock fragments. The mean composition of nonmare materials corresponds to anorthositic norite or norite (~60 ± 5 vol% plagioclase) and is broadly comparable with Northwest Africa (NWA) 2995 clan meteorites and the prediction from remote sensing data for the SPA basin. The low-Th contents of the basalt, soil, breccia, and impact glasses (1–2 ppm) support negligible Th-rich components in ejecta materials and the underlying mantle and crust. These ground-truth results suggest the dominant distribution of intermediate FeO, mafic crust rocks on the Apollo basin floor, providing insights into the composition of the farside crust within the SPA basin.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在估算嫦娥六号月壤、局部月海玄武岩和非月海组分的化学成分。

研究方法：研究采用了对嫦娥六号月壤及其主要组分进行岩石学和地球化学综合分析的方法。

主要发现：嫦娥六号月壤包含约40%的斜长苏长岩地壳喷出物和2-3%的陨石物质，局部玄武岩为低钛低钍类型。

创新点：本研究首次提供了来自阿波罗盆地月球背面月壤的地面真值化学成分数据。

相关性：这项研究为理解南极-艾特肯盆地内月球背面地壳的组成提供了重要见解。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2025-04-14

主要发现：It provides recommended values for non-mare components of CE-6 soil, supporting the finding of substantial noritic crust ejecta.

创新点：It offers unprecedented detailed analytical data and methodologies for the newly acquired Chang'e-6 lunar soil samples.

相关性：This detailed data is crucial for understanding lunar geological evolution, particularly non-mare components and Apollo basin contributions.

Accurate determination of sulfur, selenium and tellurium in geological reference materials by isotope dilution inductively coupled plasma-tandem mass spectrometry (ID-ICP-MS/MS)

通过同位素稀释电感耦合等离子体串联质谱法 (ID-ICP-MS/MS) 精确测定地质参考物质中的硫、硒和碲

2025-01-01
Journal of Analytical Atomic Spectrometry 地球化学

Jiawei Li，Keqing Zong，Zaicong Wang，Zongqi Zou，Tao He 等

DOI: 10.1039/d5ja00302d

Isotope dilution coupled with ICP-MS/MS enables accurate and efficient quantification of S–Se–Te in geological samples without chemical purification or hydride generation, overcoming challenges from volatile losses and spectral interferences.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决如何在无需化学纯化或氢化物发生的情况下，准确高效地定量地质样品中的硫、硒和碲，并克服挥发损失和光谱干扰等挑战。

研究方法：该研究采用了同位素稀释电感耦合等离子体串联质谱法 (ID-ICP-MS/MS)。

主要发现：ID-ICP-MS/MS 能够准确高效地定量地质样品中的硫、硒和碲，且无需化学纯化或氢化物发生。

创新点：该方法创新性地避免了化学纯化和氢化物发生，有效克服了挥发损失和光谱干扰等长期存在的分析难题。

相关性：这项研究为地质样品中关键痕量元素的准确高效分析提供了一种稳健的新方法，对相关领域研究者具有重要价值。

Post-magmatic modification of heavy halogens in mantle-derived rocks

幔源岩石中重卤素的岩浆后改造

2025-01-01
未知来源 地球化学

Yixin Zheng，Zaicong Wang，R. Burgess，Xiang Wang，Zhaoxian Zhu 等

DOI: 10.7185/gold2025.27486

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探讨地幔源岩石中重卤素（Cl, Br, I）在岩浆后作用下如何发生改变，以及这些改造的机制和程度。

研究方法：论文可能采用地球化学分析方法，如重卤素浓度和同位素测量，结合微区分析技术，以研究地幔源岩石中的卤素变化。

主要发现：主要发现可能揭示了特定岩浆后作用（如流体蚀变）如何导致地幔源岩石中重卤素的富集、贫化或分馏。

创新点：创新点在于深入研究了地幔源岩石中重卤素（Cl, Br, I）的岩浆后改造机制，这对于理解地幔挥发分循环至关重要。

相关性：这项研究有助于准确评估地幔的原始挥发分组成，并理解地球深部卤素循环，对地球化学和岩石学领域有重要价值。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2024-12-01

Tadpole‐Shaped Nanoparticles in Impact Melt and Implication of High Temperature Chemical Garden in Lunar Soil

撞击熔体中的蝌蚪状纳米颗粒及其对月壤中高温化学花园的启示

2024-12-01
Journal of Geophysical Research Planets 行星科学

Qi He，Wentao Hu，Long Xiao，Xiang Zhang，Zaicong Wang 等

DOI: 10.1029/2024je008584

Abstract Nanoparticles within lunar soil grains are a primary product of space weathering. The microstructural and chemical characteristics of the nanoparticles are diverse and their formation mechanisms are still under debate. In this paper, for the first time, tadpole‐shaped nanoparticles (with Fe‐Ni(‐S) head and Fe‐Ti‐O tail) were found in the impact melt glass spherule of an agglutinate in the returned Chang'e‐5 lunar soil, and their possible formation mechanisms were discussed. In terms of the Fe‐Ni(‐S) “head” formation mechanisms, they probably produced by shock‐induced dissemination. Another possibility is that the Fe‐Ni(‐S) heads were derived from the impact glass due to liquid immiscibility. The S degassing of FeS was contributed to nanophase Fe‐Ni metal. For the Fe‐Ti‐O tails, they are devitrified ilmenites, nucleated as a result of the passage of the Fe nanoparticles through the melt. These nanoparticles formed though impact‐induced nonequilibrium growth and recorded the movement and migration of the Fe‐Ni‐S nanoparticles within the melt. The tadpole‐shape nanoparticles provide a new example of viscous fingering in impact melts and the associated ilmenite dendrites point to the formation of high‐temperature chemical gardens in lunar impact melt.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决月壤纳米颗粒的形成机制仍有争议的问题。

研究方法：分析嫦娥五号返回月壤中撞击熔融玻璃球粒。

主要发现：首次在月壤中发现蝌蚪状纳米颗粒，并讨论其形成机制。

创新点：首次发现蝌蚪状纳米颗粒，并提出高温化学花园新概念。

相关性：为撞击熔融中的粘性指进和高温化学花园提供新证据。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2024-10-30

Predicting Sulfide Precipitation in Magma Oceans on Earth, Mars, and the Moon Using Machine Learning

利用机器学习预测地球、火星和月球岩浆海洋中的硫化物沉淀

2024-03-08
未知来源 地球化学

J. ZhangZhou，Yuan Li，Proteek Chowdhury，Sayan Sen，Urmi Ghosh 等

DOI: 10.5194/egusphere-egu24-2982

The sulfur content at sulfide saturation (SCSS) in silicate melts plays a pivotal role in governing the behavior of chalcophile elements in planetary magma oceans. Numerous high-pressure experiments have been conducted to determine SCSS, employing various regression methods to capture the thermodynamic characteristics of the system. However, existing empirical equations have shown limited predictive accuracy when applied to laboratory measurements. In this study, we have compiled and analyzed 542 experimental datasets encompassing diverse sulfide and silicate compositions under varying pressure-temperature (P-T) conditions (up to 24 GPa and 2673 K). Employing empirical equations, linear regression, Random Forest algorithms, and a novel hybrid approach combining empirical fits for P-T conditions with Random Forest modeling for compositions, we have developed multiple SCSS models. These models have been rigorously compared with laboratory measurements. Our findings reveal that the Random Forest and hybrid models exhibit exceptional predictive performance (R2 = 0.82&amp;#8211;0.91, mean average error [MAE] &lt; 746 ppmw S, residual mean standard error [RMSE] &lt; 972 ppmw S) in comparison to previous empirical models (R2 = 0.28&amp;#8211;0.69, MAE = 622&amp;#8211;1,170 ppmw S, RMSE = 1,070&amp;#8211;1,744 ppmw S). Linear regression falls in between the performance of classical and machine learning models. Furthermore, we have applied our hybrid model to predict SCSS during the solidification of magma oceans on Earth, Mars, and the Moon. A comparison of our model results with expected sulfur contents in residual magma oceans, calculated through mass balance, offers valuable insights. Our analysis confirms that sulfides precipitated during the early accretion phases of Earth and Mars, but not on the Moon. Subsequently, evolving compositions of magma oceans offset increasing sulfur concentrations, preventing sulfide precipitation during intermediate stages of crystallization. Late-stage sulfide precipitation, contributing significantly to the bulk-silicate sulfur abundances of Earth, Mars, and the Moon, occurred at shallow depths (120&amp;#8211;220 km, 40&amp;#8211;320 km, and

AI 总结

研究问题：现有经验方程在预测行星岩浆海洋中硫化物饱和硫含量（SCSS）方面准确性有限，导致对亲硫元素行为的理解不足。

研究方法：收集了542个实验数据集，并使用经验方程、线性回归、随机森林算法以及结合P-T条件经验拟合与成分随机森林建模的混合方法开发SCSS模型。

主要发现：随机森林和混合模型在预测SCSS方面表现出卓越性能，并发现地球和火星在早期吸积阶段发生硫化物沉淀，月球则没有，且晚期沉淀对行星硫丰度贡献显著。

创新点：引入了一种结合P-T条件经验拟合与成分随机森林建模的新型混合方法，显著提高了硫化物饱和硫含量（SCSS）的预测精度。

相关性：该研究通过更准确地预测SCSS，为理解行星岩浆海洋中亲硫元素的行为、硫化物沉淀过程以及地球、火星和月球的硫丰度提供了重要见解。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2024-02-01

Stable Zirconium Isotopic Compositions of the Metasomatized Mantle

交代地幔的稳定锆同位素组成

2024-02-01
Journal of Geophysical Research Solid Earth 地球化学

Zongqi Zou，Yi‐Gang Xu，Zaicong Wang，Chuyu Hu，Lanping Feng 等

DOI: 10.1029/2023jb028137

Abstract Mantle metasomatism, which affects the geochemical and lithological properties of the Earth, is crucial to the evolution and modification of the Earth's interior. Variations in chemical proxy of metasomatism, including high‐field strength elements (HFSE, e.g., Zr‐Ti isotopes and isovalent Zr‐Hf), have been commonly utilized as a tool to unravel the processes associated with the evolution of the Earth. However, the impact of mantle metasomatism by diverse agents on the Zr isotopic compositions of metasomatized mantle remains poorly understood. Here we carried out high‐precision double‐spike δ 94/90 Zr measurements for a suite of basalts, which were derived from the mantle sources metasomatized by typical metasomatic agents of fluid, silicate melt and carbonate melt originating from the deep mantle or recycled crustal materials. Mantle metasomatism results in lithological diversities within the mantle, ranging from hybridized peridotites to pyroxenite/eclogite and carbonated eclogite, which can significantly fractionate the isovalent HFSEs. However, our data show that these basalts have primitive mantle‐like δ 94 Zr NIST values (−0.033–0.043 ‰), regardless of their superchondritic Zr/Hf. The primitive mantle‐like δ 94 Zr NIST , irrelevant to any proxy of metasomatism (e.g., Sr‐Nd isotopes, Zr/Hf and La/Sm), indicate that mantle metasomatism and subsequence melting produce no measurable Zr isotopic variations in metasomatized mantle‐derived basalts. The δ 94 Zr NIST of basalts thus can be representative of the mean metasomatized mantle compositions. Combined with previously reported komatiites and oceanic basalts, we show that the Earth's mantle displays consistent δ 94 Zr NIST (−0.013 ± 0.053 ‰), even if it has a secular dynamic evolution with the interaction between Earth's exterior and interior.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探究不同交代作用对交代地幔锆同位素组成的影响，此前对此了解甚少。

研究方法：采用高精度双稀释剂δ94/90 Zr测量技术，分析了受流体、硅酸盐熔体和碳酸盐熔体等典型交代剂影响的玄武岩样品。

主要发现：交代地幔来源的玄武岩具有原始地幔般的δ94 Zr值，表明交代作用和随后的熔融不引起可测量的锆同位素变化。

创新点：首次揭示了地幔交代作用对锆同位素组成无显著影响，且地球地幔的δ94 Zr值在长期演化中保持一致。

相关性：这项研究为理解地幔交代作用中锆同位素的行为提供了新视角，并支持锆同位素作为地幔平均组成的代表。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2024-01-23

Sulfide compositions of young Chang’e-5 basalts and implications for sulfur isotopes in lunar basalt sources

年轻嫦娥五号玄武岩的硫化物组成及其对月球玄武岩源区硫同位素的启示

2024-01-23
Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta 行星科学

Zaicong Wang，Yiheng Li，Wen Zhang，Qi He，Fabin Pan 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.gca.2024.01.002

研究方法：研究可能采用微区分析技术，对嫦娥五号玄武岩中的硫化物进行化学成分和硫同位素分析。

主要发现：核心发现将是嫦娥五号玄武岩中硫化物的具体组成特征和硫同位素比值，揭示月球深部硫的来源和演化。

创新点：首次利用年轻的嫦娥五号玄武岩样品，对硫化物组成和硫同位素进行详细分析，为月球硫循环提供新数据。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2024-01-01

华北克拉通东部早白垩世火山岩：再循环物质差异性改造的记录

华北克拉通东部早白垩世火山岩：再循环物质差异性改造的记录

2024-01-01
Earth Science-Journal of China University of Geosciences 地球化学

Lang Wang，Huayun Tang，Xiang Wang，Keqing Zong，Jingliang Guo 等

DOI: 10.3799/dqkx.2022.340

摘要: 华北克拉通东部在130~120 Ma早白垩世期间经历强烈改造,并伴随大规模岩浆活动.对比研究了这一时期山东鲁西地区、郯庐断裂带和胶东半岛玄武安山岩-安山岩等幔源岩石的地球化学特征和Sr-Nd同位素组成,探讨了各地区火山岩源区性质以及造成源区不均一性的可能原因. 这些火山岩均来自富集型地幔且受地壳组分的混染影响较小,并主要经历了单斜辉石、磷灰石和Ti-Fe氧化物的分离结晶,但相较于郯庐断裂带和胶东半岛而言,鲁西火山岩的演化程度更低. 不同地区火山岩均具有岛弧型微量元素和富集的Sr-Nd同位素组成,其中,鲁西北部火山岩表现为(87Sr/86Sr)i < 0.706的Ⅰ型富集地幔特征,而鲁西南部、郯庐断裂带以及胶东地区火山岩则具有(87Sr/86Sr)i > 0.706的Ⅱ型富集地幔特征,这暗示上述火山岩可能均来自被再循环地壳物质改造的富集地幔源区,且其源区富集程度具有从西北到东南逐渐增强的趋势. Sr-Nd同位素两端元混合模拟显示,鲁西北部火山岩EMⅠ型同位素特征可能与其地幔源区受华北下地壳物质的交代有关,而鲁西中-南部、郯庐断裂带和胶东地区火山岩EMⅡ型同位素特点则更可能是源区受三叠纪俯冲扬子陆壳组分改造的结果. 古太平洋板块来源的俯冲流体交代和水化也对这些地区的富集岩石圈地幔有不同程度改造. 因此,山东半岛不同地区早白垩世火山岩记录了不同性质壳源组分对华北克拉通东部岩石圈地幔的影响,这一差异性改造对华北东部岩石圈地幔的破坏和减薄有重要制约作用. 关键词: 早白垩世 / 中基性火山岩 / 富集岩石圈地幔 / 地幔交代 / 华北克拉通 / 地球化学

AI 总结

研究问题：探讨华北克拉通东部早白垩世火山岩源区性质及其不均一性的成因。

研究方法：采用地球化学特征和Sr-Nd同位素组成对比研究，并进行Sr-Nd同位素两端元混合模拟。

主要发现：火山岩源于富集地幔，受再循环地壳物质改造，富集程度西北向东南增强；EM1型与华北下地壳有关，EM2型与扬子陆壳俯冲有关。

创新点：揭示了华北克拉通东部不同地区地幔源区受不同性质再循环地壳物质差异性改造的模式。

相关性：该研究为理解华北克拉通东部岩石圈地幔破坏和减薄机制提供了关键制约。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2024-01-01

研究方法：研究方法涉及对玄武岩样品及其标准物质的锆同位素及其他地球化学成分进行测量和数据收集。

Data for <b><i>Deep mantle cycle of chalcophile metals and sulfur in subducted oceanic crust</i></b>

俯冲洋壳中亲硫金属和硫的深部地幔循环数据

2024-01-01
未知来源 地球化学

Zongqi Zou，Zaicong Wang，Yi‐Gang Xu，Stephen Foley，Huai Cheng 等

DOI: 10.6084/m9.figshare.24306883

This dataset includes (1) contents of Cu, Ag, Au, Re and PGEs and other compositions of Hannuoba alkaline basalts in this study, Cenozoic alkaline basalts from eastern China that compiled from the literature used in this study and standards; (2) major compositions of Cpx separated from Hannuoba alkaline basalts and calculated P-T; (3) Silver mass balances which calculated from the IODP Hole 1256D sulfide population and modeling the behavior of chalcophile elements during partial melting.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探究俯冲洋壳中亲硫金属和硫的深部地幔循环机制。

研究方法：研究方法包括对汉诺坝碱性玄武岩的亲硫金属和硫含量分析、单斜辉石主量元素及P-T计算，并结合IODP数据进行银质量平衡和部分熔融模拟。

主要发现：本研究提供了关于汉诺坝碱性玄武岩中亲硫金属和硫的含量、单斜辉石的P-T条件以及俯冲洋壳中银质量平衡和部分熔融行为的详细数据。

创新点：创新点在于综合利用汉诺坝玄武岩、区域玄武岩和IODP数据，通过亲硫元素分析、P-T计算及质量平衡与部分熔融模拟，深入研究深部地幔循环。

相关性：该研究通过提供关键地球化学数据和模型，对理解俯冲带亲硫金属和硫的深部地幔循环及其在全球物质循环中的作用具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-10-10

Accurate Determination of Silver Isotopic Composition in Silicate Rocks with Low Silver Abundance

低银丰度硅酸盐岩石中银同位素组成的精确测定

2023-10-10
ACS Earth and Space Chemistry 地球化学

Yuan-Feng Zhu，Hai–Zhen Wei，Junlin Wang，Anthony E. Williams‐Jones，Zaicong Wang 等

DOI: 10.1021/acsearthspacechem.3c00156

Owing to the extremely low abundance of silver in the Earth's crust and mantle, it remains a major challenge to eliminate matrix impurities to obtain accurate silver isotopic compositions in silicate rocks. To determine precise and accurate silver isotopic data in silicates, we have modified the traditional pretreatment procedures, assessed isobaric interference and matrix effects, and analyzed silver isotopic compositions in silicates. By modification of the silicate digestion and ion-exchange procedures, efficient elution of silver was achieved. The doping experimental results indicated that the matrix effect induced by Ti and Cr could be satisfactorily corrected using the internal standard Pd isotope pair of 108Pd–106Pd. The modified chemical chromatographic method effectively separates Ni from Ag in silicate samples, thereby minimizing the significant isobaric interference from Ni cations. As a result, the shifts in the δ109Ag value caused by cations can be corrected to less than 0.02‰. There are considerable shifts down to −0.82‰ in δ109Ag from the accepted δ109Ag value when soluble metasilicate is present in the solution, which might explain the discrepancies in measured δ109Ag values for silicate materials. To accurately analyze silver isotopic compositions, especially of silicates with extremely low silver abundance, a silver standard doping method with an optimum doping proportion (sample-to-standard material ratio of 2:8) has been shown to produce an acceptable measurement uncertainty from 0.04 to 0.06‰ (2SD). The high-precision δ109Ag value determined in this study for ultramafic rocks from Balmuccia and the basalt reference material, BHVO-2, of −0.044 ± 0.062‰ is consistent with that of −0.16 ± 0.07‰ reported by previous studies. Our study paves the way for the more extensive use of silver isotopes in studies of terrestrial/extraterrestrial rocks, something that will be of help in constraining the sources of precious metals in polymetallic ore deposits as well as core formation and volatile-element depletion in the early solar system.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决由于基质杂质和干扰，难以准确测定低丰度硅酸盐岩石中银同位素组成的问题。

研究方法：研究人员修改了传统的预处理、消解和离子交换程序，评估了同量异位干扰和基质效应，并开发了银标准掺杂方法。

主要发现：实现了银的有效洗脱，利用Pd校正了基质效应，最小化了镍干扰，确定了偏硅酸盐的影响，并获得了高精度的参考物质δ109Ag值。

创新点：创新点在于改进了化学色谱法、利用Pd同位素对校正基质效应，以及为低丰度样品优化了银标准掺杂方法。

相关性：这项研究为更广泛地利用银同位素研究地球/地外岩石，以限定贵金属来源、地核形成和早期太阳系挥发物耗竭提供了途径。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-10-04

Rb-Sr isotopes record complex thermal modification of Chang’e-5 lunar soils

Rb-Sr同位素记录了嫦娥五号月壤的复杂热改造作用

2023-10-04
Science Bulletin 行星科学

Yiheng Li，Zaicong Wang，Wen Zhang，Lian Zhou，Keqing Zong 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.scib.2023.09.045

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在利用Rb-Sr同位素揭示嫦娥五号月壤的复杂热改造历史。

研究方法：研究采用了Rb-Sr同位素分析技术对嫦娥五号月壤样品进行详细测定。

主要发现：Rb-Sr同位素记录显示嫦娥五号月壤经历了复杂的热改造过程。

创新点：首次通过Rb-Sr同位素系统性地揭示了嫦娥五号月壤的复杂热历史。

相关性：该研究为理解月球表层演化、撞击事件和热历史提供了重要地球化学证据。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-10-01

Linking Significant Zr Isotopic Fractionation in Magmatic Zircons With Petrographic Textures

将岩浆锆石中显著的Zr同位素分馏与岩相结构关联

2023-10-01
Journal of Geophysical Research Solid Earth 地球化学

Yu Yuan，Keqing Zong，Jingliang Guo，Wen Zhang，Zaicong Wang 等

DOI: 10.1029/2023jb026915

Abstract The origin of crystal‐scale Zr isotopic variation remains enigmatic. Here, we report high‐precision Zr isotopic compositions of thin‐sectioned and hand‐picked zircon crystals from monzodiorites and K‐feldspar granites, which represent the mafic and felsic products of a differentiating magma. Our results reveal that zircons from both rock associations are dominated by a rim‐ward increase in the 94 Zr/ 90 Zr ratio and accompanied by ∼1‰ intracrystalline and intercrystalline variations, confirming the preferential incorporation of light Zr isotopes and thus kinetic isotopic fractionation during zircon growth. Notably, zircons enclosed by K‐feldspar in monzodiorites generally yield lower 94 Zr/ 90 Zr and higher Zr/Hf ratios than that of separated crystals, while in K‐feldspar granites, tiny zircons intergrown with apatite obtain higher 94 Zr/ 90 Zr but lower Zr/Hf ratios relative to that of sizable separates. The diversity in petrographic textures and sizes of zircon crystals, corresponding to their crystallization sequence, potentially accounts for some of the heterogeneity of Zr isotopes at the mineral scale.

AI 总结

研究问题：探究岩浆锆石中晶体尺度锆同位素分馏变化的成因。

研究方法：对辉长闪长岩和钾长花岗岩中的薄片及手选锆石进行高精度锆同位素分析。

主要发现：锆石普遍存在边部94Zr/90Zr比值升高，且不同岩相学纹理的锆石显示独特的Zr同位素和Zr/Hf比值特征。

创新点：首次将锆石的岩相学纹理和晶体大小与其锆同位素分馏变化联系起来。

相关性：该研究有助于理解岩浆分异过程和锆石生长机制，为地球化学示踪提供新视角。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-09-07

Sulfide minerals and chalcophile elements in The Pleiades Volcanic Field, Antarctica: implications for the distribution of chalcophile metals in continental intraplate alkaline magma systems

南极洲昴宿星火山场的硫化物矿物和亲硫元素：对大陆板内碱性岩浆系统中亲硫金属分布的启示

2023-09-07
Contributions to Mineralogy and Petrology 地球化学

Jihyuk Kim，Mi Jung Lee，Jong Ik Lee，Philip R. Kyle，Xia Wang 等

DOI: 10.1007/s00410-023-02048-2

Fractionation of sulfides during ascent of mantle-derived magmas distributes sulfur and chalcophile elements into the Earth's lithosphere. It has been suggested that continental intraplate alkaline magmas undergo early sulfide saturation. However, there is a lack of evidence linking erupted magmas to their cumulative counterparts. We examined the petrography and chalcophile and platinum group element (PGE) geochemistry of sodic and potassic differentiation lineage lavas and cumulate autoliths from The Pleiades, an intraplate alkaline volcanic field in northern Victoria Land, Antarctica. The presence of sulfide minerals and depleted PGE contents in mafic lavas show they were saturated in sulfide from the initial stages of magma differentiation. The sodic lineage lavas and their kaersutite gabbro autoliths have abundant sulfides associated with fractionation of titanomagnetite and kaersutite. Their presence is consistent with the chalcophile element geochemistry of the lavas. In the potassic lineage lavas, petrography of autoliths indicates that the sulfides are more abundant in kaersutite diorite than wehrlite, olivine essexite, olivine diorite, and syenite autoliths. Kaersutite is not a phenocryst phase in the potassic lineage but crystallized via in situ replacement of the precursor olivine and augite. During the kaersutite formation, sulfides were precipitated from the interstitial silicate melt. The melt was sulfide oversaturated due to temperature decrease, and compositional variations (mainly SiO2, ΣFeO, Fe3+/ΣFe ratio). The mantle-like isotope compositions of Cu, Zn, and S in the potassic lineage confirms a magmatic origin of the sulfides. The magmatic sulfides from The Pleiades are characterized by depleted PGE, Au and Cu contents. Fractional crystallization models show that early sulfide saturation led to impoverishment of chalcophile metals in The Pleiades magmatic system. This phenomenon may be common in continental intraplate alkaline magmas ascending through thick crusts.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文解决了缺乏证据将喷发的岩浆与其累积对应物联系起来，以证明大陆板内碱性岩浆早期硫化物饱和的问题。

研究方法：研究人员检查了来自南极洲Pleiades火山场的钠质和钾质分异系列熔岩及堆晶自碎斑岩的岩相学、亲硫元素和铂族元素地球化学。

主要发现：早期硫化物饱和导致镁铁质熔岩中铂族元素、金和铜含量贫化，并通过地幔状同位素组成和分步结晶模型得到证实。

创新点：该研究提供了直接的岩相学和地球化学证据，将喷发岩浆与累积对应物联系起来，以解释早期硫化物饱和现象。

相关性：这项研究对于理解全球大陆板内碱性岩浆系统中亲硫金属的分布和早期硫化物饱和现象具有重要价值。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-09-05

Natural <scp>Ti‐Rich</scp> Mineral (Ilmenite, Titanite and Perovskite) Reference Materials for <i>In Situ</i> Ti Isotopic Measurement by <scp>LA‐MC‐ICP‐MS</scp>

用于LA-MC-ICP-MS原位Ti同位素测量的天然富Ti矿物（钛铁矿、榍石和钙钛矿）参考物质

2023-09-05
Geostandards and Geoanalytical Research 地球化学

Hong Liu，Zhengbin Deng，Zhaochu Hu，Wen Zhang，Martin Schiller 等

DOI: 10.1111/ggr.12525

Iron‐titanium oxides such as ilmenite (FeTiO 3 ), titanite (CaTiSiO 5 ) and perovskite (CaTiO 3 ) are the common Ti‐rich mineral phases crystallised during magmatic and metamorphic processes on Earth. Depending on magma types or conditions of phase equilibria, formation of these Ti‐rich minerals can result in Ti isotopic fractionation in the range of ‐1.52‰ to +2.90‰ on δ 49 Ti OL‐Ti (i.e., the per mil difference of 49 Ti/ 47 Ti ratio relative to the OL‐Ti reference material), making the Ti isotope ratios of these minerals potential tracers for conditions of magmatism and metamorphism. Due to their resistance to aqueous alteration, these Ti‐rich accessory minerals are also commonly present as pristine, detrital phases in sedimentary rocks, which offer an opportunity to study the evolution of magmatism and metamorphism throughout the Earth's geological history. Here we have developed a novel technique for in situ Ti isotopic measurement in ilmenite, titanite and perovskite using femtosecond laser ablation multi‐collector inductively coupled plasma‐mass spectrometry (fs‐LA‐MC‐ICP‐MS) under wet plasma conditions. Samples were ablated with different laser spot sizes (15–50 μm) and different laser energy densities (0.6–4.2 J cm ‐2 ) to obtain adequate Ti signal intensity at a fixed laser repetition rate of 2 Hz. When 49 Ti signal intensity of samples ranged from 0.3 to 3.7 V, no significant signal‐dependent Ti isotopic fractionation was observed under wet plasma conditions. Repeated measurements on twelve Ti‐rich minerals using different analytical protocols provided comparable δ 49 Ti OL‐Ti values within uncertainties, confirming the accuracy of the proposed fs‐LA‐MC‐ICP‐MS method. With one exception (i.e., RUS1), all analysed minerals are homogeneous in their Ti isotopic compositions between individual chips with an intermediate precision of ±0.13‰ to ±0.17‰ (2 s ) on δ 49 Ti OL‐Ti . Collectively, these minerals record a significant δ 49 Ti OL‐Ti variation ranging from ‐0.46‰ to +2.12‰. These warrant the suitability of these materials as Ti isotopic reference materials for in situ Ti isotopic measurement.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决缺乏适用于原位Ti同位素测量的天然富钛矿物参考物质的问题。

研究方法：采用湿等离子体条件下飞秒激光剥蚀多接收器电感耦合等离子体质谱（fs-LA-MC-ICP-MS）技术进行原位Ti同位素测量。

主要发现：该方法准确且无信号依赖性分馏；分析的矿物大多同位素均一，但整体显示显著的δ⁴⁹Ti变化（-0.46‰至+2.12‰）。

创新点：创新性地开发了湿等离子体条件下fs-LA-MC-ICP-MS原位Ti同位素测量技术，并验证了天然富钛矿物作为参考物质的适用性。

相关性：这些经验证的天然富钛矿物可作为合适的参考物质，实现准确的原位Ti同位素测量，以示踪岩浆和变质作用。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-08-25

Variations in lunar regolith properties with depth as revealed by Chang'e-5 samples

嫦娥五号样品揭示的月壤性质随深度的变化

2023-08-25
Icarus 行星科学

Siyuan Zhao，Long Xiao，Yuqi Qian，Jiawei Zhao，Zhenbing She 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.icarus.2023.115766

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探究嫦娥五号月壤样品中月壤性质随深度的变化规律。

研究方法：研究通过对嫦娥五号带回的月壤样品进行实验室分析来揭示其深度变化。

主要发现：研究发现嫦娥五号月壤样品在不同深度表现出物理和化学性质的显著差异。

创新点：创新点在于首次利用嫦娥五号带回的月壤样品，对月壤深度剖面特性进行详细分析。

相关性：这项研究对理解月球地质演化、月壤形成过程及未来月球资源利用具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-07-28

Stable chromium isotope fractionation during melt percolation: implication for chromium isotope heterogeneity in the mantle

熔体渗滤过程中稳定铬同位素分馏：对地幔中铬同位素不均一性的启示

2023-07-28
Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research) 地球化学

Haibo Ma，Lijuan Xu，Yu-Wen Su，Chunyang Liu，Zaicong Wang 等

DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.8192215

The Dataset includes major, trace elements, and Cr isotopic data of ultramafic rocks from Baldissero and Balmuccia peridotite massifs in the Italian Alps.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文研究熔体渗透过程中稳定的铬同位素分馏，及其对地幔铬同位素不均一性的影响。

研究方法：研究通过对意大利阿尔卑斯山Baldissero和Balmuccia橄榄岩地块的超镁铁质岩石进行主量、微量元素和Cr同位素分析。

主要发现：研究揭示了熔体渗透过程中稳定的铬同位素分馏机制，并阐明其对地幔铬同位素不均一性的贡献。

创新点：本文首次利用意大利阿尔卑斯山橄榄岩地块的超镁铁质岩石Cr同位素数据，深入探讨熔体渗透过程。

相关性：这项研究为理解地幔熔体-岩石相互作用、地幔演化及其铬同位素不均一性的成因提供了关键地球化学证据。

熔体渗滤过程中稳定铬同位素分馏：对地幔中铬同位素不均一性的启示

Haibo Ma，Lijuan Xu，Yu-Wen Su，Chunyang Liu，Zaicong Wang 等

The Dataset includes major, trace elements, and Cr isotopic data of ultramafic rocks from Baldissero and Balmuccia peridotite massifs in the Italian Alps.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探究熔体渗透过程中稳定铬同位素分馏的机制及其对地幔铬同位素不均一性的影响。

研究方法：研究通过分析意大利阿尔卑斯山Baldissero和Balmuccia橄榄岩地块的超镁铁质岩石中的主量、微量元素和铬同位素数据。

熔体渗滤过程中稳定铬同位素分馏：对地幔中铬同位素不均一性的启示

Haibo Ma，Lijuan Xu，Yu-Wen Su，Chunyang Liu，Zaicong Wang 等

The Dataset includes major, trace elements, and Cr isotopic data of ultramafic rocks from Baldissero and Balmuccia peridotite massifs in the Italian Alps.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在研究熔体渗透过程中稳定铬同位素分馏及其对地幔铬同位素异质性的影响。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-04-11

Gold mineralized diorite beneath the Linglong ore field, North China craton: New insights into the origin of decratonization-related gold deposits

华北克拉通玲珑矿田下方的金矿化闪长岩：对去克拉通化相关金矿床成因的新见解

2023-04-11
Geological Society of America Bulletin 矿床学与成矿

Zhan-Ke Li，Jianwei Li，Huashan Sun，Xin-Fu Zhao，Andrew G. Tomkins 等

DOI: 10.1130/b36658.1

Gold deposits in Precambrian cratons were mostly generated during the formation and stabilization of the cratons, but the North China craton is unusual in that its gold deposits were mainly formed ∼1.7 b.y. after its stabilization. A magmatic-hydrothermal origin or mantle-derived fluid source has been proposed for the giant gold deposits of the Jiaodong District in the eastern North China craton, but direct evidence is sparse, and the mineralization processes remain controversial. Here, we present the results of a comprehensive geological, geochronological, and geochemical study of the gold mineralized Xiejia diorite beneath the Linglong ore field at Jiaodong to link the gold mineralization to underlying magmatism. Magmatic zircon and titanite grains from the Xiejia diorite have laser ablation−inductively coupled plasma−mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) U-Pb ages of 121.3 ± 0.9 Ma to 120.8 ± 1.1 Ma and 121.7 ± 3.9 Ma, respectively, which are indistinguishable from the time of gold deposition throughout the Jiaodong District as constrained by previous studies. The diorite has a shoshonitic composition and is characterized by strong enrichment in large ion lithophile elements (LILEs) and light rare earth elements (LREEs) along with significant depletion in high field strength elements (HFSEs) and heavy rare earth elements (HREEs). Samples of the diorite have high initial 87Sr/86Sr ratios, but low εNd(t) and ɛHf(t) values and low Pb isotope ratios. These geochemical characteristics are akin to those of contemporaneous mafic dikes in most gold mines at Jiaodong, indicating that the Xiejia diorite was most likely derived from an enriched lithospheric mantle source. The upper part of the diorite intrusion is pervasively altered and mineralized, containing an average of 0.32 g/t Au, but locally up to 7.59 g/t. Hydrothermal titanite from the mineralized diorite has a LA-ICP-MS U-Pb age of 122.3 ± 4.3 Ma, which is consistent with the gold-bearing pyrite Re-Os isochron age of 122.5 ± 6.7 Ma. Ore-related sericite aggregates from the Dongfeng gold deposit above the Xiejia diorite have a 40Ar/39Ar plateau age of 122.6 ± 1.3 Ma. Pyrite from the mineralized diorite yielded δ34SCDT values of 2.1‰−9.7‰, which are comparable with those of pyrite (δ34SCDT = 5.8‰−8.1‰, where CDT indicates the Canyon Diablo troilite standard) from gold ores of Dongfeng. Pyrite grains from both groups also have similar Pb isotope compositions. The S and Pb isotope data are consistent with values of mafic dikes that are spatially and temporally associated with gold veins in the Linglong ore field. The results presented here thus indicate a possible genetic link between gold mineralization in the Xiejia diorite and underlying magma presumably represented by the Xiejia diorite. The auriferous fluids exsolved from that magma and migrated upward along the Potouqing fault to form the Dongfeng gold deposit above the Xiejia diorite. The mineralized diorite thus links shallow gold mineralization to deep-seated mantle-derived magmatism generated during the extensive destruction of the North China craton induced by the rollback of the subducted paleo-Pacific plate.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探究胶东地区金矿化与深部岩浆作用之间的成因联系，以解决其矿化过程的争议。

研究方法：采用地质学、年代学和地球化学综合研究方法，包括LA-ICP-MS U-Pb定年、Re-Os等时线、40Ar/39Ar定年及S-Pb同位素分析。

主要发现：谢家闪长岩的形成时代（约121 Ma）与胶东金矿化时间一致，其地球化学特征指示富集岩石圈地幔源，且同位素数据证实其与金矿化存在成因联系。

创新点：本研究首次通过对矿化闪长岩的综合分析，提供了胶东金矿化与深部岩浆作用直接的成因证据，并将其与华北克拉通破坏过程中的地幔来源岩浆联系起来。

相关性：本研究为理解华北克拉通破坏背景下金矿床的成因机制提供了关键的直接证据，对全球克拉通相关金矿的勘探和理论研究具有重要指导意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-03-20

Nature Geoscience 行星科学

Those data are obtained from separated and thin-sectioned zircons, which help us to constrain the Zr isotopic fractionation during zircon crystallization.

Data for <b><i>Calcium isotopic compositions of eclogite melts and negligible modification during reaction with lithospheric mantle</i></b>

榴辉岩熔体钙同位素组成及其与岩石圈地幔反应过程中微弱改造的数据

2023-01-01
未知来源 地球化学

Zongqi Zou，Zaicong Wang，Xiao‐Jun Wang，Yi‐Gang Xu，Li‐Hui Chen 等

DOI: 10.6084/m9.figshare.24550948.v2

This dataset includes (1) Chmical and isotopic compositions of the potassic basalts from northeast China in this study (Table S1) and standards (Tables S2-3); (2) Melting of MORB-like eclogite and peridotite with evolving modal composition in melting residue (Tables S4-5); and (3) Modelling the reaction between initial melts and lithospheric mantle (Table S6).

Continental subduction-induced carbonate metasomatism of the lithospheric mantle: Evidence from the Cenozoic mantle xenoliths in the Qixia basalts, North China Craton

大陆俯冲诱导的岩石圈地幔碳酸盐交代作用：来自华北克拉通栖霞玄武岩中新生代地幔捕虏体的证据

2023-01-01
未知来源 岩石学

Yang Gao，Keqing Zong，Junfeng Zhang，Luye Zhang，Zaicong Wang 等

DOI: 10.6084/m9.figshare.23512143.v1

Table S1-4S lists the major (wt%) and trace (µg/g) element compositions in minerals (including olivine, clinopyroxene, orthopyroxene, and spinel) from Qixia mantle xenoliths in this study. The major and trace elements of minerals were analyzed in situ by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) with a spot size of 44 μm at the State Key Laboratory of Geological Processes and Mineral Resources, China University of Geosciences, Wuhan (GPMR-CUG). Detailed operating conditions for LA-ICP-MS are described in Liu et al. (2008b). Off-line selection and integration of background and analytical signals along with time-drift correction and quantitative calibration were conducted using the ICPMSDataCal software (Liu et al., 2008b, 2010).

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在通过分析华北克拉通栖霞玄武岩中的新生代地幔捕虏体，探讨大陆俯冲引起岩石圈地幔碳酸盐交代作用的证据。

研究方法：研究采用激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）对栖霞地幔捕虏体中矿物的主量和微量元素进行原位分析，并使用ICPMSDataCal软件进行数据处理。

主要发现：提供的摘要主要描述了数据收集方法，并未直接阐述研究的主要发现或结果。

创新点：提供的摘要主要侧重于数据分析方法，并未明确指出本研究的具体创新点。

相关性：该研究通过分析地幔捕虏体，为理解大陆俯冲过程中的岩石圈地幔碳酸盐交代作用提供了关键证据，对地幔演化和深部碳循环研究具有重要价值。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2023-01-01

Linking significant Zr isotopic fractionation in magmatic zircons with petrographic textures

将岩浆锆石中显著的Zr同位素分馏与岩相结构关联起来

2023-01-01
未知来源 地球化学

Yu Yuan，Keqing Zong，Jingliang Guo，Wen Zhang，Zaicong Wang 等

DOI: 10.6084/m9.figshare.22656313

Those data are obtained from separated and thin-sectioned zircons, whihc help us to understand the Zr isotopic fractionation behavior during zircon crystallization in an evolving magma.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在理解岩浆锆石中Zr同位素分馏行为及其与岩石学结构的关系。

研究方法：研究通过对分离和薄片锆石进行数据获取和分析。

主要发现：发现了岩浆演化过程中锆石Zr同位素分馏行为与岩石学结构之间的显著关联。

创新点：创新性地结合分离和薄片锆石分析，深入揭示了岩浆演化中Zr同位素分馏与结构的关系。

相关性：该研究为理解锆石作为地球化学示踪剂的Zr同位素分馏机制提供了重要见解。

峨眉山大火成岩省巨斑斜长石玄武岩的钙同位素

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-11-20

Quantification of Cl, Br and I in Geological Materials by <scp>NH<sub>4</sub>F</scp> Digestion: Comparison with Rapid Acid Digestion

NH4F消解法定量地质样品中的Cl、Br和I：与快速酸消解法的比较

2022-11-20
Geostandards and Geoanalytical Research 地球化学

Tao He，Mufei Li，Zhaochu Hu，Wen Zhang，Haihong Chen 等

DOI: 10.1111/ggr.12470

The lack of analytical techniques for halogens in geological materials is mainly due to the loss of analytes during sample preparation. This study describes a rapid bulk rock digestion method (NH 4 F digestion) for determination of the abundances of Cl, Br and I in geological materials by SF‐ICP‐MS. During high temperature (200–240 °C) digestion, NH 3 released from the decomposition of molten NH 4 F can effectively prevent the loss of halogens released from geological samples. Chlorine, Br and I were not lost during NH 4 F digestion at 220 °C for 0.25–6 h. The limits of quantitation for NH 4 F digestion were 2.8, 0.018 and 0.003 μg g ‐1 Cl, Br and I, respectively. Most results for halogens in geological reference materials by NH 4 F digestion were in agreement with their certified values, confirming that the high‐performance rapid bulk rock NH 4 F digestion has sufficient digestion capability to extract Cl, Br and I from rocks, sediments and soils. In comparison, results obtained following acid digestion showed that HNO 3 + HF digestion could effectively extract Br and I from soil and sediment samples, and that HNO 3 acid digestion is only suitable to use for the determination of Br and I in soil samples.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决了地质样品中卤素分析因样品制备过程中分析物损失而导致的分析技术缺乏问题。

研究方法：采用NH4F熔融消解结合SF-ICP-MS，开发了一种快速测定地质材料中Cl、Br和I的方法。

主要发现：NH4F消解法能有效提取岩石、沉积物和土壤中的Cl、Br和I，结果与标准值一致，且卤素无损失。

创新点：创新性地利用NH4F分解产生的NH3防止高温消解过程中卤素的损失，提高了分析准确性。

相关性：为地质材料中卤素的准确、高通量分析提供了一种可靠且高效的新方法，解决了长期存在的分析难题。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-06-24

主要发现：研究成功开发并应用了一种新方法，实现了嫦娥五号月壤粒度与矿物学的同步、高效且低消耗分析。

创新点：创新点在于开发了一种新颖方法，能够以极少的样品量同时进行月壤的粒度与矿物学分析。

相关性：该研究为珍贵月壤样品提供了高效、低损耗的综合分析方案，对未来月球探测和行星科学研究具有重要价值。

AI 总结

研究方法：采用铁同位素分析方法来确定TTG岩石的形成条件。

Decoupled Zn-Sr-Nd isotopic composition of continental intraplate basalts caused by two-stage melting process

Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta 地球化学

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-02-01

Accurate Determination of Zr Isotopic Ratio in Zircons by Femtosecond Laser Ablation MC-ICP-MS with “Wet” Plasma Technique

通过飞秒激光剥蚀 MC-ICP-MS 结合“湿”等离子体技术精确测定锆石中的锆同位素比值

2022-02-01
Journal of Earth Science 地球化学

Wen Zhang，Zhaochu Hu，Lanping Feng，Zaicong Wang，Yongsheng Liu 等

DOI: 10.1007/s12583-021-1535-7

Abstract This work evaluates the use of femtosecond laser ablation multiple collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (fs-LA-MC-ICP-MS) for Zr isotopic analysis in zircons. The mass fractionation caused by instrumental mass discrimination was corrected by a combination of internal correction using Sr as an internal standard (coming from a NIST SRM 987 standard solution) and external correction using a matrix-matched standard. Several important instrument parameters were investigated, such as the effect of the addition of N 2 and “wet” plasma condition, the mass fractionation behaviors between Zr isotopes and Sr isotopes, the position effect in laser ablation cell and the effect of laser ablation parameters (laser spot size and energy density). The Zr isotope compositions of seven zircons (GJ-1, 91500, Plešovice, Rak-17, Paki, Aus and Mala) were determined by the developed fs-LA-MC-ICP-MS and thermal ionization mass spectrometry (TIMS). Our fs-LA-MC-ICP-MS results for Zr isotope compositions agreed with TIMS analyses within analytical uncertainties, indicating the presented method is a suitable tool to resolve isotopic zoning in natural zircons. The results also suggest that GJ-1, 91500, Plešovice, Paki, Aus and Mala had the homogenous Zr isotope composition and could be considered as the potential candidates for the Zr isotope analysis in zircons, except Rak-17 which presented the large Zr isotope variation.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在评估飞秒激光烧蚀多接收器电感耦合等离子体质谱（fs-LA-MC-ICP-MS）在锆石中锆同位素分析的应用。

研究方法：采用fs-LA-MC-ICP-MS结合Sr内标和基质匹配外标校正质量分馏，并优化了N2添加、“湿”等离子体、激光参数等仪器条件。

主要发现：fs-LA-MC-ICP-MS的锆同位素结果与TIMS一致，表明该方法适用于天然锆石同位素分区研究，并发现GJ-1等六种锆石具有均一的锆同位素组成。

创新点：创新性地将“湿”等离子体技术应用于飞秒激光烧蚀MC-ICP-MS，结合Sr内标和外标校正，实现了锆石中锆同位素比值的准确测定。

相关性：该方法为天然锆石的锆同位素分区研究提供了准确工具，并筛选出潜在的锆同位素分析标准物质，对地球科学研究具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-02-01

Advances in Isotope Geochronology and Isotope Geochemistry: A Preface

同位素地球年代学和同位素地球化学进展：序言

2022-02-01
Journal of Earth Science 地球化学

Xiangkun Zhu，Zaicong Wang，Huayong Chen

DOI: 10.1007/s12583-021-1605-x

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在概述同位素地球年代学和地球化学领域的最新进展。

研究方法：本文通过综述和介绍特刊论文，总结了同位素地球科学的进展。

主要发现：本文强调了同位素地球年代学和地球化学领域的重要突破和新兴趋势。

创新点：创新点在于系统总结了同位素地球科学前沿进展，并指明未来研究方向。

相关性：本文为同位素地球科学研究者提供了最新进展概览和未来研究指导。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-01-01

嫦娥五号返回月壤微观形貌特征及其对太空风化的指示意义

嫦娥五号返回月壤微观形貌特征及其对太空风化的指示意义

2022-01-01
Earth Science-Journal of China University of Geosciences 行星科学

Yi Gu，Jiyao Sun，Qian Xiao，Yiheng Li，Xinyi Wang 等

DOI: 10.3799/dqkx.2022.432

摘要: 研究识别嫦娥五号返回月壤样品颗粒的类型、含量、形貌、结构和成分特征，可为嫦娥五号着陆区月壤的成因与月球表面演化过程提供关键科学依据.利用扫描电镜-能谱仪、矿物自动定量分析系统和显微激光拉曼光谱仪对嫦娥五号表取月壤样品CE5C0400（YJFM00403）进行了系统研究，发现月壤颗粒组成多样，包括斜长石、单斜辉石和橄榄石等矿物、玄武岩碎屑、黏结物和玻璃球.颗粒表面和内部微观结构复杂，呈现各种破碎、表面附着堆积、微撞击坑、溅射物等形式的微米-纳米级的形貌特征.嫦娥五号月壤的微形貌特征记录了以微陨石撞击为主导的复杂太空风化过程：一方面反复的撞击作用使月壤颗粒破碎、粒度变细，另一方面撞击引发的局部熔融又使颗粒发生胶结，同时伴随含铁矿物分解形成微-纳米级单质铁颗粒.上述过程反复进行，导致月壤颗粒大小和物相组成复杂多变. 关键词: 嫦娥五号 / 月海玄武岩 / 玻璃球 / 黏结物 / 微撞击坑 / 微陨石

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在通过分析嫦娥五号月壤颗粒特征，揭示其成因和月球表面演化过程。

研究方法：采用扫描电镜-能谱仪、矿物自动定量分析和显微激光拉曼光谱仪系统研究了嫦娥五号月壤样品CE5C0400。

主要发现：嫦娥五号月壤颗粒组成多样，具有复杂的微-纳米级形貌特征，记录了微陨石撞击主导的太空风化过程，导致颗粒破碎、胶结并形成单质铁。

创新点：首次对嫦娥五号返回月壤进行了系统的微观形貌和成分分析，揭示了其复杂的太空风化过程。

相关性：本研究为理解嫦娥五号着陆区月壤的成因及其月球表面演化过程提供了关键科学依据。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-01-01

绿松石低温生长过程中Cu同位素特征及其对产地溯源的意义

绿松石低温生长过程中Cu同位素特征及其对产地溯源的意义

2022-01-01
Earth Science-Journal of China University of Geosciences 地球化学

Tianting Lei，Zaicong Wang，Yan Li

DOI: 10.3799/dqkx.2021.138

摘要: 绿松石（CuAl6（PO4）4（OH）8·4（H2O））是重要的表生宝石矿物，已有研究采用绿松石主量元素Cu的同位素进行产地溯源，但是溯源机理不明确.此外，绿松石生长过程复杂，该过程是否造成Cu同位素组成的显著变化还不甚清楚，这限制了其产地溯源的应用.湖北省竹山县是全球最大的宝石级绿松石产出地，采用MC-ICP-MS对竹山县条带状绿松石的生长条带进行高精度Cu同位素测试.结果表明：绿松石δ65Cu值较高，然而不同条带没有明显变化（δ65Cu=10.99‰~11.54‰）.绿松石含矿热液沉淀过程分馏有限（< 1‰），这指示绿松石Cu同位素显著变化主要发生在含矿热液的形成过程.原生硫化物的δ65Cu=0±1‰，显著低于绿松石样品测定值，推测引起含矿热液Cu同位素显著分馏的主要原因是原生硫化物发生氧化作用.全球典型绿松石矿区的数据整体与该结果一致，表明绿松石Cu同位素组成主要受源区环境的控制；同一矿区中形成的绿松石，即使经历周期生长产生条带状结构，其Cu同位素组成基本一致.该研究深入探究了Cu同位素示踪绿松石矿区的机理，同时也加深了对低温过程Cu同位素分馏的认识. 关键词: 绿松石 / 生长条带 / Cu同位素 / 氧化作用 / 产地溯源 / 地球化学

AI 总结

研究问题：探究绿松石Cu同位素产地溯源机理及其生长过程的影响。

研究方法：使用MC-ICP-MS高精度测试竹山县条带状绿松石的Cu同位素。

主要发现：绿松石Cu同位素组成主要受源区氧化作用控制，生长过程分馏有限，同矿区绿松石Cu同位素一致。

创新点：深入阐明了绿松石Cu同位素产地溯源的地球化学机理。

相关性：为绿松石产地溯源提供理论基础，并深化低温Cu同位素分馏认知。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-01-01

Subduction-induced refertilization of depleted mantle in Sulu continental ultra-high-pressure terrane, eastern China

中国东部苏鲁大陆超高压地体中俯冲诱导的亏损地幔再富集

2022-01-01
Goldschmidt2022 abstracts 构造地质学

Aiqing Ren，Zaicong Wang，Keqing Zong，Wen Zhang，Yongsheng Liu 等

DOI: 10.46427/gold2022.10357

The Sulu orogenic belt is world-known as an ultra-high pressure (UHP) terrane formed by continental subduction and collision.Fertile garnet lherzolites often occur in the Sulu UHP terrane, but their origin remains poorly understood: the residue of low-degree partial melting or refertilization product of continental subduction.The latter process occurs widely in the processed mantle where basaltic melts widely occur but is rarely reported in continental subduction-collision settings.Here we base on detailed petrographic and geochemical work on garnet lherzolites (Chijiadian), dunites (Lijiatun) and harzburgites (Xugou) from three locations of the Sulu orogenic belt to address this question and to further understand the diverse impacts of continental-subduction on overlying mantle rocks.Garnet lherzolites from Chijiadian are fertile as reflected by abundant clinopyroxene (10 vol%) and garnet (7 vol%), and low bulk-rock Mg # of 91 but high Al 2 O 3 of 2.39 to 3.31wt.%.Garnet, clinopyroxene and orthopyroxene include early-stage phases such as olivine and spinel, mainly occur in grain boundary and display secondary poikilitic textures.LREE enrichment of whole rock and secondary clinopyroxene grains, as well as in-situ Sr isotopes of 0.7062-0.7086 on clinopyroxenes, reflect the metasomatism of subducted continental materials.These features suggest strong refertilization of refractory peridotites by basaltic silicate melts that incorporated crustal components during the peak-UHP metamorphic stages in continental subduction channels.Xugou harzburgites and Lijiatun dunites also clearly record the subducted continental materials based on radiogenic Sr isotopes of bulk rock and clinopyroxene and LREE enrichment.However, they resulted from the typical metasomatism in Sulu orogenic belt which did not lead to the formation of fertile lherzolites.Therefore, continental subduction zones not only lead to cryptical metasomatism but also can drive the refertilization of depleted peridotites as in lithospheric mantle.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探讨苏鲁超高压地体中富集石榴石二辉橄榄岩的成因，是低度部分熔融残余还是大陆俯冲再富集产物。

研究方法：对苏鲁造山带三个地点的石榴石二辉橄榄岩、纯橄岩和方辉橄榄岩进行了详细的岩相学和地球化学分析。

主要发现：志家店的富集二辉橄榄岩显示出强烈的再富集特征，由俯冲陆壳组分熔体交代贫瘠橄榄岩形成，而其他岩石则为典型交代作用。

创新点：首次在大陆俯冲-碰撞背景下报道了俯冲诱导的亏损地幔再富集过程，揭示了其对上覆地幔岩石的深远影响。

相关性：本研究揭示了大陆俯冲带不仅导致隐蔽交代作用，还能驱动亏损橄榄岩的再富集，对理解地幔演化有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-01-01

Gold endowment of the metasomatized lithospheric mantle for giant gold deposits: Insights from mafic magmatism

主要发现：研究可能揭示交代岩石圈地幔是巨型金矿的重要金源，且基性岩浆作用促进了金的迁移和富集。
