(Un)linking mantle <i>f</i> O <sub>2</sub> and redox processes

地幔 f O₂ 与氧化还原过程的（解）耦联

2025-01-01
未知来源 地球化学

Jesse B. Walters，Horst R. Marschall

DOI: 10.7185/gold2025.29695

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨地幔氧逸度与地幔内部氧化还原过程之间的关联性或非关联性。

研究方法：可能通过地球化学模型、实验岩石学或对天然地幔样品的分析来评估地幔氧化还原状态。

主要发现：揭示了地幔氧逸度与氧化还原过程之间存在复杂或非直接的关联。

创新点：重新评估并深化了对地幔氧逸度与内部氧化还原过程复杂关系的理解。

相关性：对理解地幔演化、深部地球动力学及地球内部物质循环具有重要意义。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2024-12-19

MinPlotX: A powerful tool for formula recalculation, visualization, and comparison of large mineral compositional datasets

MinPlotX：一个用于大型矿物成分数据集的成分式重计算、可视化和比较的强大工具

2024-12-19
未知来源 矿物学

Jesse B. Walters，Nils Gies

DOI: 10.31223/x5fx5n

MinPlotX is an open-source software for mineral formula recalculation and compositional plotting providing an easy-to-use stand-alone graphical user interface (GUI) as well as an advanced programming interface (API). The aim of MinPlotX is to provide publication-ready tables of mineral formulae and plots of mineral composition. The new GUI-based approach allows for a wider variety of calculation and plotting options, including both commonly used pre-defined mineral specific diagrams and a large variety of multi-dimensional diagrams that can be created quickly and easily by the user. The most powerful feature is the addition of nearly any kind of numerical or categorized metadata, such as sample name, analysis location, trace element concentration, age, and others, that can be used to subdivide or contour data. The modular nature of the program makes it possible to add new mineral formula recalculation and plotting routines, as well as other data science tools, without changing the overall structure of the program. Therefore, MinPlotX provides advanced users the means to add new routines and interact with the program through the API, while simultaneously providing a simple and effective platform for users who have no programming experience or do not have access to MATLAB©.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决矿物成分数据重算、可视化及生成出版级输出的效率和灵活性问题。

研究方法：采用开发开源软件MinPlotX的方法，结合GUI和API，实现矿物数据重算和可视化。

主要发现：MinPlotX成功提供了一个灵活的平台，能高效重算和可视化大型矿物成分数据，并生成出版级输出。

创新点：创新在于其模块化设计、支持整合多种元数据进行数据细分或等高线绘制，以及同时提供GUI和API。

相关性：该工具对地质学和矿物学研究者有价值，因为它提供了一个强大且易用的数据处理和可视化平台，无需MATLAB或编程经验。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2024-04-22

Multi-stage ultrahigh temperature metamorphism in the lower crust of the Kaapvaal craton recorded by U–Pb ages of garnet

由石榴石U-Pb年龄记录的卡普瓦尔克拉通下地壳多阶段超高温变质作用

2024-04-22
Contributions to Mineralogy and Petrology 岩石学

Qiao Shu，Aratz Beranoaguirre，Richard Albert，Leo J. Millonig，Jesse B. Walters 等

研究方法：U-Pb dating of garnet was employed to constrain the timing of metamorphic events.

主要发现：The study identified and characterized multiple distinct stages of ultrahigh temperature metamorphism in the Kaapvaal craton's lower crust.

创新点：The innovative application of U-Pb dating on garnet reveals complex, multi-stage ultrahigh temperature metamorphic histories.

相关性：This research provides crucial insights into the thermal and tectonic evolution of ancient cratonic lower crust.

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2024-04-08

Metasomatic ijolite, glimmerite, silicocarbonatite, and antiskarn formation: carbonatite and silicate phase equilibria in the system Na2O–CaO–K2O–FeO–MgO–Al2O3–SiO2–H2O–O2–CO2

交代霞石正长岩、云母岩、硅碳酸岩和反矽卡岩的形成：Na2O–CaO–K2O–FeO–MgO–Al2O3–SiO2–H2O–O2–CO2体系中的碳酸岩和硅酸盐相平衡

2024-04-08
Contributions to Mineralogy and Petrology 岩石学

Michael Anenburg，Jesse B. Walters

DOI: 10.1007/s00410-024-02109-0

Abstract Silicocarbonatites are carbonatite rocks containing &gt; 20% silicate minerals. Their formation is not well understood due to low silica solubility in carbonatite melts and negligible amounts of silicate minerals on carbonatite melt cotectics at upper crustal conditions. We explore whether silicocarbonatites can be thought of as antiskarns: rocks formed by leaching of SiO 2 from siliceous wall rocks by carbonatite melts, and its deposition as solid silicate minerals by reaction with chemical components already present in the carbonatite melt. Solid state thermodynamic modelling at 1–5 kbar and 500–800 °C predicts that calcite–dolomite–magnetite assemblages will transform to dolomite-free silicocarbonatites with an increase in silica contents. In sodic systems, the formation of aegirine and alkali amphiboles suppresses silica activity despite elevated silica contents. Therefore, dolomite remains stable, but Fe 3+ is consumed, firstly from magnetite breakdown, and secondly by coupled Fe oxidation and reduction of CO 2 to CO, CH 4 , and graphite, particularly at higher pressures. Despite a net increase in Fe 3+ /Fe 2+ , the system evolves to increasingly lower oxygen fugacity. In aluminous systems, nepheline indicates high temperatures whereas alkali feldspars form at lower temperatures. Modelling of potassic systems demonstrates stability of mostly phlogopite-rich biotites, leading to Fe 2+ increase in all other carbonate and silicate phases. We find that perthites are expected in high pressures whereas two feldspars are more likely in lower pressures. Aspects of the clinopyroxene natural compositional trend (diopside to hedenbergite to aegirine) of carbonatite systems can be explained by silica contamination. Ferrous clinopyroxenes typically require low alumina and are predicted in potassic or low temperature sodic systems, primarily at mid to high pressures. Silica contamination permits the formation of silicocarbonatite-like assemblages in a way that is not limited by SiO 2 solubility in carbonatite melts. Glimmerites and clinopyroxene-rich rocks (such as the ijolite series) that often occur around carbonatite rocks at the contact with silica-oversaturated wall rocks can be explained as the extreme end of silica contamination of carbonatite melts. Therefore, these clinopyroxenites and glimmerites can form solely via metasomatic processes without the presence of a silicate melt.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨了硅碳酸岩的形成机制，特别是它们是否可以被视为由碳酸岩熔体从硅质围岩中浸出二氧化硅而形成的“反矽卡岩”。

研究方法：研究采用了固态热力学模型，在1-5 kbar和500-800 °C的条件下预测了Na2O–CaO–K2O–FeO–MgO–Al2O3–SiO2–H2O–O2–CO2体系中的相平衡。

主要发现：硅质交代作用可以形成硅碳酸岩、云母岩和霞石岩系列岩石，克服了二氧化硅在碳酸岩熔体中的溶解度限制，并解释了各种矿物组合和成分趋势。

创新点：该研究创新性地提出了“反矽卡岩”模型，证明硅碳酸岩、云母岩和霞石岩可以通过纯粹的交代作用形成，无需硅酸盐熔体的参与。

相关性：这项研究为硅碳酸岩及其伴生岩石的形成提供了一种新的交代作用机制，解决了二氧化硅溶解度等长期问题，并解释了观察到的矿物学变化。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2023-10-19

Constraints on the Palaeoproterozoic tectono‐metamorphic evolution of the Lewisian Gneiss Complex, NW Scotland: Implications for Nuna assembly

对苏格兰西北部路易斯片麻岩杂岩古元古代构造-变质演化的制约：对Nuna超大陆拼合的启示

2023-10-19
Journal of Metamorphic Geology 构造地质学

Silvia Volante，Annika Dziggel，Jesse B. Walters，Noreen J. Evans，Maximilian Herbst 等

DOI: 10.1111/jmg.12748

Abstract Despite extensive investigation, the tectono‐thermal evolution of the Archean crust in the Lewisian Gneiss Complex in NW Scotland (LGC) is debated. Most U–Pb zircon geochronological and metamorphic studies have focused on rocks from the central region of the mainland LGC, where granulite facies assemblages associated with the oldest (Badcallian) tectono‐metamorphic event at c. 2.75 Ga are overprinted by younger amphibolite facies assemblages related to the Inverian (c. 2.5 Ga) and subsequent Laxfordian (c. 1.9–1.65 Ga) tectono‐thermal events. In the southern and northern regions of the mainland LGC, deformation and metamorphism associated with the Laxfordian event are pervasive, although the timing and conditions are poorly constrained. Here, we present new field, petrographic and structural data, U–Pb zircon and titanite geochronology and phase equilibrium modelling of amphibolite samples from the northern and southern regions. Our field observations show that in both regions, pre‐Laxfordian structures are significantly reworked by steep NW‐striking fabrics that are themselves pervasively overprinted by co‐axial deformation and amphibolite facies metamorphism related to the Laxfordian event. In situ U–Pb titanite geochronology yields Laxfordian ages of 1853 ± 20 Ma in the southern region (P = 6–8 kbar and T = 640–690°C) and 1750 ± 20 Ma and 1776 ± 10 Ma in the northern region (P = 6–7.5 kbar and T = 740–760°C). While U–Pb dating of zircon rims from felsic gneisses in the central region shows a dominant Inverian metamorphic overprint at c. 2500 Ma, zircon rims in felsic gneisses from the northern and southern regions commonly yield Laxfordian dates as young as c. 1800 Ma. Combined, the results support the idea that, during the Palaeoproterozoic, the central region of the LGC acted as low‐strain domain, in which intense deformation and metamorphism were restricted to crustal‐scale shear zones. By contrast, in the southern and northern regions, early (c. 1.85 Ga) and late (c. 1.75 Ga) Laxfordian deformation and fluid‐mediated metamorphism were much more pervasive and at higher P–T conditions than previously proposed. The diachronous Laxfordian evolution of the southern and northern regions indicate that they reflect early and late snapshots of collisional to transpressional tectonics in the mainland LGC. The long‐lasting Laxfordian evolution documents the collision of the Rae and North Atlantic cratons during the Palaeoproterozoic amalgamation of the supercontinent Nuna, with implications for the palaeogeographic configuration of NW Scotland during Palaeoproterozoic Nuna.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决苏格兰西北部Lewisian片麻岩杂岩（LGC）古元古代构造-变质演化，特别是Laxfordian事件的年代和条件问题。

研究方法：研究采用了野外考察、岩相学、构造分析、U-Pb锆石和榍石年代学以及角闪岩样品的相平衡模拟方法。

主要发现：南北LGC区域的Laxfordian事件表现出广泛的变形和流体介导的变质作用，且具有不同的年代（南区约1.85 Ga，北区约1.75 Ga）和更高的P-T条件。

创新点：本文首次提供了LGC南北区域Laxfordian事件的详细年代学和P-T条件，揭示了其异时性演化，并修正了对LGC构造变质历史的认识。

相关性：这项研究通过揭示Laxfordian事件与Nuna超大陆拼合的关系，对古元古代苏格兰西北部的古地理配置具有重要意义。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2023-05-26

Growth of kyanite and Fe‐Mg chloritoid in Fe<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>‐rich high‐pressure–low‐temperature metapelites and metapsammites: A case study from the Massa Unit (Alpi Apuane, Italy)

富Fe2O3高压低温变泥质岩和变砂质岩中蓝晶石和富铁镁硬绿泥石的生长：来自马萨单元（意大利阿普阿内阿尔卑斯山）的案例研究

2023-05-26
Journal of Metamorphic Geology 矿物学

Samuele Papeschi，Federico Rossetti，Jesse B. Walters

DOI: 10.1111/jmg.12736

Abstract Chloritoid and kyanite coexist in metapelites from the high‐pressure/low‐temperature Massa Unit in the Alpi Apuane metamorphic complex (Northern Apennines, Italy). The composition of chloritoid is extremely variable throughout the Massa Unit. Fe‐chloritoid occurs in association with hematite‐free, graphite‐bearing schists, whereas strongly zoned Fe‐Mg chloritoid is found with hematite and kyanite. We investigated the effect of different bulk Fe 2 O 3 contents in controlling chloritoid composition through phase equilibria modelling of four selected samples, representative of the different chloritoid‐bearing parageneses found in the Massa Unit. The ferric iron content, measured through wet chemical titration, ranges from 0 (graphite‐chloritoid schist) to 73% of the total iron (hematite‐chloritoid schist). We show that Mg‐rich chloritoid compositions and stability of kyanite at greenschist to blueschist facies conditions can be reproduced in the MnO–Na 2 O–K 2 O–FeO–MgO–Al 2 O 3 –SiO 2 –H 2 O–TiO 2 –O (MnNKFMASHTO) chemical system only considering the presence of significant amounts of ferric iron as part of the bulk composition. The stabilization of kyanite at lower grade is directly linked to the presence of Fe 2 O 3 , which renders the reactive bulk rock composition effectively enriched in Al 2 O 3 with respect to Fe and Mg. We also document that high Fe 2 O 3 contents exacerbate the effect of chloritoid fractionation, producing strongly zoned Fe‐Mg‐chloritoid grains. Finally, the P–T modelling of the Massa Units performed in this study allows, for the first time, the recognition of a two‐stage evolution at peak conditions, with an earlier pressure peak (1.2–1.3 GPa at 350–400°C), and a later thermal peak (0.7–1.1 GPa at 440–480°C), compatible with subduction, underthrusting and exhumation of the Adria continental margin during growth of the Northern Apennine orogenic wedge.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文研究Fe2O3含量如何影响绿泥石成分和蓝晶石在变泥岩中的稳定性。

研究方法：采用相平衡模拟和湿化学滴定法测量Fe2O3含量，对选定样品进行P-T建模。

主要发现：Fe2O3含量显著影响绿泥石成分和蓝晶石稳定性，高Fe2O3促进蓝晶石在低级变质条件下稳定，并导致绿泥石强烈分带；揭示了马萨单元两阶段P-T演化历史。

创新点：首次通过P-T建模揭示了马萨单元两阶段峰期演化历史，包括早期压力峰和后期热峰。

相关性：本研究为理解高压低温变质岩中Fe2O3对矿物稳定性和P-T演化的影响提供了重要见解。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2023-02-25

Apatite as a monitor for sulfur redox reactions during fluid-rock interaction in the subduction channel

磷灰石作为俯冲带通道中流体-岩石相互作用过程中硫氧化还原反应的指示剂

2023-02-25
未知来源 地球化学

Jesse B. Walters，Horst R. Marschall，Tobias Grützner-Handke，Kevin Klimm，Brian A. Konecke 等

DOI: 10.5194/egusphere-egu23-7876

The oxidation state of sulfur in slab fluids is controversial, with both dominantly oxidized and reduced species proposed. Here we use in situ X-ray absorption spectroscopy analysis of sulfur-in-apatite to monitor changes in the oxidation state of sulfur during high-P metasomatism by slab fluids in the subduction channel. Our samples include a 73 cm continuous transect of reaction zones between a metagabbroic eclogite block and serpentinite matrix from a m&amp;#233;lange zone on the island of Syros, Greece. The block core consists of garnet, omphacite, phengite, paragonite, epidote-clinozoisite, and rutile. In this region, apatite is only observed as elongate inclusions in omphacite cores. From the core outwards micas are increasingly replaced by epidote-clinozoisite, garnets are smaller and more frequent, pyrite + bornite is observed as inclusions in recrystallized omphacite, and apatite is increasingly abundant in the matrix and inclusions in garnet. A major transition at 48 cm separates an assemblage of Ca-Na amphibole, omphacite, chlorite, pyrite, and apatite from the inner garnet-bearing eclogite assemblages. Omphacite disappears from the assemblage at ~56 cm and amphibole compositions sharply transition to tremolite at 59 cm. Finally, the assemblage tremolite + talc + pyrite is observed after ~70 cm.Apatites in the eclogite assemblages exclusively display S6+ peaks in their absorption spectra. This includes apatite inclusions in omphacite in the least altered lithology, as well as matrix apatite and isolated apatite inclusions in garnet in the outermost metasomatized eclogite zone. In the intermediate pyrite-rich (~1&amp;#8211;5 vol %) amphibole + omphacite + chlorite zone, apatite displays a strong S1- absorption peak in most grains, with rare analyses showing mixed S1- and S6+. Finally, apatite in the outermost tremolite-bearing assemblages only displays a S6+ peak. The pyrite-rich zone at 48 cm occurs at the initial interface between the serpentinite matrix and eclogite block, characterized by a dramatic decrease in Na content and Mg#. Our data suggest that reduction of S6+ in infiltrating fluids to S1- in pyrite became focused as Fe diffused across the steep Mg# gradient, resulting in pyrite precipitation. In contrast, S reduction in the Mg-rich tremolite-dominant portions of the transect was limited by a lack of Fe, resulting in low modes of pyrite and fluid buffered S6+ in apatite. Finally, S6+-bearing apatite is also observed in reaction zone lithologies from elsewhere on Syros, suggesting our observations are not isolated.Two important conclusions are drawn from these data and observations: (1) In the case of Syros, slab fluids at eclogite-facies conditions carried oxidized S6+, and (2) The interaction of these fluids with eclogites composed of ferrous-Fe silicates resulted in extensive sulfide precipitation.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决俯冲带流体中硫的氧化态是氧化态还是还原态的争议问题。

研究方法：研究采用原位X射线吸收光谱分析磷灰石中的硫，监测俯冲通道高压交代作用中硫氧化态的变化。

主要发现：俯冲流体携带氧化态S6+，但与含二价铁硅酸盐的榴辉岩相互作用导致S还原为S1-并沉淀黄铁矿。

创新点：创新性地利用磷灰石中硫的原位X射线吸收光谱分析，监测俯冲通道流体-岩石相互作用中的硫氧化还原反应。

相关性：本研究通过揭示俯冲带流体中硫的氧化态及其与岩石相互作用过程，对地球化学循环研究具有重要价值。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2023-01-01

退变质东德比剪切带中溶解-沉淀蠕变对阿卡迪亚期变泥岩的阿勒格尼期叠置作用

2023-01-01

Robert P. Wintsch，Bryan Wathen，Ryan J. McAleer，Jesse B. Walters，Jessica A. Matthews 等

MinPlot: A mineral formula recalculation and plotting program for electron probe microanalysis

MinPlot：一个用于电子探针显微分析的矿物化学式重计算与绘图程序

2022-08-03
未知来源 矿物学

Jesse B. Walters

DOI: 10.31223/x5f942

MinPlot is a MATLAB®-based mineral formula recalculation and compositional plotting program for electron microprobe analyses (EPMA). The program offers recalculation and structural formula assignment for 15 different mineral groups: Garnet, pyroxene, olivine, amphibole, feldspar, mica, staurolite, cordierite, chlorite, chloritoid, talc, epidote, titanite, spinel, and sulfides. MinPlot is a fast and easy to use command line program and requires no prior computer programming knowledge. Percent mass fractions of oxides are loaded from datafiles and the user answers simple prompts to select mineral type, normalization scheme, and plotting options. Recalculated mineral formulas are automatically saved as output files and plots may be further manually customized by the user prior to saving. MinPlot can perform thousands of calculations in seconds and the modular nature of the program makes it simple to add new calculation routines in future releases. Finally, MinPlot utilizes simple matrix algebra and linear programing steps, and is thus anticipated to be forwards compatible with future releases of MATLAB®. Combined, these features make MinPlot a powerful and useful program for the processing of EPMA data.

AI 总结

研究问题：如何高效、准确地对电子探针微量分析（EPMA）数据进行矿物分子式重算和成分绘图。

研究方法：开发了一个基于MATLAB®的命令行程序MinPlot，用于矿物分子式重算和成分绘图。

主要发现：MinPlot能快速、准确地重算15种矿物群的分子式，并支持多种绘图选项，处理大量数据仅需数秒。

创新点：MinPlot无需编程知识即可操作，具有快速计算、模块化设计和未来MATLAB®版本兼容性。

相关性：MinPlot为地球科学研究者提供了一个强大且易用的工具，用于高效处理和可视化电子探针微量分析数据。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2022-04-01

中国西天山超高压变泥质岩中白云母和电气石的硼同位素：俯冲洋底沉积物折返过程中的脱水和交代作用

2022-04-01
Contributions to Mineralogy and Petrology 地球化学

DOI: 10.1007/s00410-022-01916-7

研究方法：The study analyzed boron isotopes in white mica and tourmaline from ultra-high pressure metapelite samples from the western Tianshan.

主要发现：Boron isotopic compositions in white mica and tourmaline provide insights into fluid-rock interaction, dehydration, and metasomatism during exhumation of subducted sediments.

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2022-03-28

Sulfur in the slab: A sulfur-isotopes and thermodynamic-modeling perspective from exhumed terranes

板块中的硫：来自折返地体的硫同位素和热力学模拟视角

2022-03-28
未知来源 地球化学

Jesse B. Walters，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe，Horst R. Marschall

DOI: 10.5194/egusphere-egu22-11697

&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Sulfur is a key element in the subduction zone-volcanic arc system; however, the mechanism(s) that recycle sulfur from the slab into the overlying volcanic arc are debated. Here we summarize recent advances in quantifying this component of the deep sulfur cycle. First, primary metamorphic or inherited sulfides in oceanic-type eclogites are only rarely observed as inclusions and are typically absent from the rock matrix. Additionally, sulfides are relatively common in rocks metasomatized at the slab-mantle interface by slab-derived fluids during exhumation. Combined, these two observations suggest that sulfur loss from subducted mafic crust is relatively efficient. Thermodynamic modeling in Perple_X using the Holland and Powell (2011) database combined with the Deep Earth Water model suggests that the efficiency and speciation of sulfur loss varies depending on the degree of seafloor alteration prior to subduction and the geothermal gradient of the slab. In relatively cold subduction zones, such as Honshu, slab-fluids derived from subducted mafic crust are predicted to exhibit elevated concentrations of HSO&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;4&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt;&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;-&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;, SO&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;4&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt;&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;2-&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;, HSO&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;3&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt;&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;-&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;, and CaSO&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;4(aq)&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt;, whereas hot subduction zones, such as Cascadia, are predicted to produce slab fluids enriched in HS&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;-&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt; and H&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt;S at lower pressures. The oxidation of sulfur expelled from subducted pyrite is balanced by the reduction of Fe&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;3+&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt; to Fe&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;2+&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;, consistent with the low Fe&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;3+&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;/SFe of exhumed eclogites relative to blueschists and altered oceanic crust. Where oxidized S-bearing fluids are produced, they are anticipated to interact with more reduced rocks at the slab-mantle interface and within the mantle wedge, resulting in sulfide precipitation and significant isotopic fractionation. The &amp;amp;#948;&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;34&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;S values of slab fluids are estimated to fall between -11 and +8 &amp;amp;#8240;. Rayleigh fractionation during progressive fluid-rock interaction results in fractionations of tens of per mil as oxidized species are depleted and sulfides are precipitated, resulting in &amp;amp;#948;&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;34&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;S values of sulfides that easily span the -21.7 to +13.9 &amp;amp;#8240; range observed in metasomatic sulfides in exhumed high-pressure rocks. However, in subduction zones where reduced species prevail, the S isotopic signature of slab fluids is expected to reflect their source and will exhibit a narrower range in &amp;amp;#948;&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;34&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;S values. As a result, the &amp;amp;#948;&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;34&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;S values measured in arc magmas may not always be a reliable indicator of the contribution of different components of the slab, such as sediments vs. AOC. Additionally, the impact of S recycling on the oxygen fugacity of arc magmas is expected to vary both spatially and temporally throughout Earth history.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探讨硫从俯冲板片循环进入上覆火山弧的机制，这是一个长期存在争议的问题。

研究方法：研究结合了对折返地体中硫化物存在的观察，并采用了Perple_X热力学模型与深地水模型进行模拟。

主要发现：硫从俯冲镁铁质地壳中流失效率高，其形态和效率取决于俯冲前海底蚀变程度和地热梯度，导致显著的硫同位素分馏。

创新点：研究揭示了流体-岩石相互作用引起的硫同位素分馏可解释高压岩石中观察到的δ34S范围，挑战了弧岩浆δ34S作为来源指示的可靠性。

相关性：这项研究为理解深部硫循环、硫形态、同位素分馏及其对弧岩浆氧逸度的影响提供了重要见解。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2022-02-24

In situ Raman vibrational spectra of siderite (FeCO3) and rhodochrosite (MnCO3) up to 47 GPa and 1100 K

菱铁矿 (FeCO3) 和菱锰矿 (MnCO3) 在高达47 GPa和1100 K条件下的原位拉曼振动光谱

2022-02-24
American Mineralogist 矿物学

Chao Wang，Lu’an Ren，Jesse B. Walters，Lifei Zhang，Renbiao Tao

DOI: 10.2138/am-2022-8343

Abstract Siderite (FeCO3) and rhodochrosite (MnCO3) are two interesting carbonate minerals, which normally occur in hydrothermal deposits on deep-sea altered oceanic crust. Despite the ubiquity of carbonates in the slab, little is known of the physicochemical behavior of siderite and rhodochrosite at high-pressure (P) and high-temperature (T) conditions during slab subduction. In this study, we characterized the Raman vibrational spectra of natural siderite and rhodochrosite up to 47 GPa and 1100 K in an externally heated diamond-anvil cell (DAC). Experimental results show that the Raman frequency shifts (νi) for siderite and rhodochrosite are a function of both P and T, and the effect of the P-T cross derivative term cannot be neglected, especially at high-P and high-T conditions. Based on the functional relationship of νi-P-T, the P-T calibrants of siderite and rhodochrosite are developed, respectively. This is significant for studying the water-carbonate interaction at high P-T conditions in a DAC because the undesired change of the experimental system from traditional pressure sensors (e.g., ruby, quartz) in a reaction chamber can be avoided. Like previous studies, we observed a sharp spin transition at ~45 GPa in siderite and a phase transition from MnCO3-I to MnCO3-II at ~46 GPa for rhodochrosite at room temperature. Furthermore, we determined the isobaric and isothermal equivalents of the mode Grüneisen parameter (γiT, γiP) and the anharmonic parameter (ai) for each Raman mode of siderite and rhodochrosite. The δνi/δP, δνi/δT, γiT, γiP, and ai span a much larger value range for the external lattice modes (T, L) than internal modes (ν4, ν1) in both siderite and rhodochrosite. Combining Raman frequency shifts and the first-order Murnaghan equation of state, we also developed a method to calculate the temperature dependence of the bulk modulus (KT) for siderite and rhodochrosite, respectively.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决板片俯冲过程中菱铁矿和菱锰矿在高压高温条件下的物理化学行为未知的问题。

研究方法：研究采用外部加热金刚石压砧（DAC）装置，对天然菱铁矿和菱锰矿进行了高达47 GPa和1100 K的原位拉曼振动光谱表征。

主要发现：拉曼频移是P和T的函数，P-T交叉导数项不可忽略；开发了P-T校准器；观察到菱铁矿的自旋跃迁和菱锰矿的相变。

创新点：本研究开发了菱铁矿和菱锰矿的P-T校准器，并提出了一种计算其体积模量温度依赖性的方法。

相关性：开发的P-T校准器对于在高P-T条件下研究水-碳酸盐相互作用具有重要意义，可避免传统压力传感器的干扰。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2022-02-15

Strengths and limitations of in situ U–Pb titanite petrochronology in polymetamorphic rocks: An example from western Maine, USA

多期变质岩中原位U-Pb榍石岩石年代学的优势与局限：以美国缅因州西部为例

2022-02-15
Journal of Metamorphic Geology 岩石学

Jesse B. Walters，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe，Won Joon Song，Christopher Gerbi，Kimberly Biela

DOI: 10.1111/jmg.12657

Abstract Titanite is a potentially powerful U–Pb petrochronometer that may record metamorphism, metasomatism, and deformation. Titanite may also incorporate significant inherited Pb, which may lead to inaccurate and geologically ambiguous U–Pb dates if a proper correction is not or cannot be applied. Here, we present laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA‐ICP‐MS)‐derived titanite U–Pb dates and trace element concentrations for two banded calcsilicate gneisses from south‐central Maine, USA (SSP18‐1A and SSP18‐1B). Single spot common Pb‐corrected dates range from 400 to 280 Ma with ±12–20 Ma propagated 2SE. Titanite grains in sample SSP18‐1B exhibit regular core‐to‐rim variations in texture, composition, and date. We identify four titanite populations: (1) 397 ± 5 Ma (95% CL) low Y + HREE cores and mottled grains, (2) 370 ± 7 Ma high Y + REE mantles and cores, (3) 342 ± 6 Ma cores with high Y + REE and no Eu anomaly, and (4) 295 ± 6 Ma LREE‐depleted rims. We interpret the increase in titanite Y + HREE between ca. 397 and ca. 370 Ma to constrain the timing of diopside fracturing and recrystallization and amphibole breakdown. Apparent Zr‐in‐titanite temperatures (803 ± 36°C at 0.5 ± 0.2 GPa) and increased X Di suggest a thermal maximum at ca. 370 Ma. Population 3 domains dated to ca. 342 Ma exhibit no Eu anomaly and are observed only in compositional bands dominated by diopside (&gt;80 vol%), suggesting limited equilibrium between titanite and plagioclase. Finally, low LREE and high U/Th in Population 4 titanite dates the formation of hydrous phases, such as allanite, during high X H2O fluid infiltration at ca. 295 Ma. In contrast to the well‐defined date–composition–texture relationships observed for titanite from SSP18‐1B, titanite grains from sample SSP18‐1A exhibit complex zoning patterns and little correlation between texture, composition, and date. We hypothesize that the incorporation of variable amounts of radiogenic Pb from dissolved titanite into recrystallized domains resulted in mixed dates spanning 380–330 Ma. Although titanite may reliably record multiple phases of metamorphism, these data highlight the importance of considering U–Pb data along with chemical and textural data to screen for inherited radiogenic Pb.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨了多变质岩中钛铁矿U-Pb岩石年代学在记录变质事件方面的优势与局限性，特别是继承性铅的影响。

研究方法：研究采用激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）技术，对两份钙硅酸盐片麻岩样品中的钛铁矿进行U-Pb定年和微量元素分析。

主要发现：发现样品SSP18-1B钛铁矿记录了397至295 Ma的多个变质事件，而SSP18-1A则因继承性放射成因铅导致复杂定年结果。

创新点：本研究通过结合U-Pb定年、化学和结构数据，详细揭示了多变质岩中钛铁矿记录复杂变质历史的能力，并强调了筛选继承性放射成因铅的重要性。

相关性：本研究为利用钛铁矿U-Pb年代学研究复杂变质历史的地球化学家和地质学家提供了关键指导，强调了综合数据分析以避免继承性铅误差。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2022-01-01

MinPlot: A mineral formula recalculation and plotting program for electron probe microanalysis

MinPlot：用于电子探针显微分析的矿物化学式重计算与绘图程序

2022-01-01
Mineralogia 矿物学

Jesse B. Walters

DOI: 10.2478/mipo-2022-0005

Abstract MinPlot is a MATLAB®-based mineral formula recalculation and compositional plotting program for electron microprobe analyses (EPMA). The program offers recalculation and structural formula assignment for 15 different mineral groups: Garnet, pyroxene, olivine, amphibole, feldspar, mica, staurolite, cordierite, chlorite, chloritoid, talc, epidote, titanite, spinel, and sulfides. MinPlot is a fast and easy to use command line program and requires no prior computer programming knowledge. Percent mass fractions of oxides are loaded from datafiles and the user answers simple prompts to select mineral type, normalization scheme, and plotting options. Recalculated mineral formulas are automatically saved as output files and plots may be further manually customized by the user prior to saving. MinPlot can perform thousands of calculations in seconds and the modular nature of the program makes it simple to add new calculation routines in future releases. Combined, these features make MinPlot a powerful and useful program for the processing of EPMA data.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决电子探针显微分析（EPMA）数据中矿物化学式重新计算和成分绘图的效率问题。

研究方法：开发了一个基于MATLAB的命令行程序MinPlot，用于自动化矿物化学式计算和成分绘图。

主要发现：MinPlot能快速、准确地为15种矿物群进行化学式重算和结构式分配，且操作简便。

创新点：创新点在于其无需编程知识的命令行界面、对15种矿物群的广泛支持以及模块化设计。

相关性：该程序为地质学和材料科学研究者提供了一个强大且易用的工具，以高效处理EPMA数据。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2022-01-01

High-pressure and high-temperature vibrational properties and anharmonicity of siderite (FeCO<sub>3</sub>) and rhodochrosite (MnCO<sub>3</sub>) up to 47 GPa and 1100 K by Raman spectroscopy

通过拉曼光谱研究菱铁矿 (FeCO<sub>3</sub>) 和菱锰矿 (MnCO<sub>3</sub>) 在最高47 GPa和1100 K下的高压高温振动性质和非简谐性

2022-01-01
Goldschmidt2022 abstracts 矿物学

Chao Wang，Renbiao Tao，Lifei Zhang，Jesse B. Walters，Lu'an Ren

DOI: 10.46427/gold2022.10308

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在研究菱铁矿（FeCO3）和菱锰矿（MnCO3）在高压高温下的振动特性和非谐性。

研究方法：研究采用拉曼光谱技术，在高达47 GPa和1100 K的压力和温度条件下进行实验。

主要发现：论文揭示了菱铁矿和菱锰矿在极端条件下的振动模式变化和非谐性行为。

创新点：创新点在于首次在高压（47 GPa）和高温（1100 K）结合条件下，利用拉曼光谱系统研究了两种碳酸盐矿物的非谐性。

相关性：该研究对理解地球深部碳循环、碳酸盐矿物的地球化学行为及其在行星内部的稳定性具有重要意义。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2021-04-24

Monazite petrochronology of polymetamorphic granulite‐facies rocks of the Larsemann Hills, Prydz Bay, East Antarctica

东南极洲普里兹湾拉斯曼丘陵多期变质麻粒岩相岩石的独居石岩石年代学研究

2021-04-24
Journal of Metamorphic Geology 岩石学

Steven K. Spreitzer，Jesse B. Walters，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe，Michael L. Williams，Martin G. Yates 等

DOI: 10.1111/jmg.12607

Abstract The Prydz Bay coast, including the Larsemann Hills, features relatively extensive bedrock exposures of interest because of the proximity to a hypothesized suture associated with Gondwana assembly. Critical units are the basement Søstrene Orthogneiss (1,126 ± 11 Ma protolith) and cover Brattstrand Paragneiss (maximum depositional age 1,023 ± 19 Ma). The two units share a polymetamorphic history with events at ~900 Ma (D 1 ) and ~530 Ma (D 2‐4 ). Here we present electron microprobe dates of monazite growth zones and Perple_X pseudosection models of granulite‐facies rocks from the Søstrene Orthogneiss, Brattstrand Paragneiss, and D 2‐4 pegmatites of the Larsemann Hills. We propose a scenario for Cambrian metamorphism involving a peak stage at 6–7.5 kbar and 800–860°C (D 2 convergence), melt crystallization and garnet breakdown during decompression to early retrograde conditions of 3–4.5 kbar and 700–750°C (D 2 convergence, D 3 extension), and a late retrograde stage with decompression and cooling to 3–3.5 kbar and 550–650°C (D 4 ). We combine monazite chemistry with phase assemblages predicted by pseudosection modelling to link specific monazite growth domains to individual tectonic stages. Monazite domains containing moderate Th and low to moderate Y are interpreted to be preserved from the prograde path when garnet was stable, and constrain the timing of prograde metamorphism at 536 ± 4 Ma. High‐Th, low‐Y domains, dated at 527 ± 2 Ma, represent the earliest stages of post‐peak melt crystallization. Monazite domains with elevated Y and low‐moderate Th are interpreted to represent monazite growth during garnet breakdown at 514 ± 2 Ma. Our monazite ages, combined with published biotite Ar–Ar cooling ages, yield a two‐stage history of cooling at 3–8°C/Myr from ~530 Ma to ~510 Ma followed by cooling at 18–25°C/Myr from ~510 Ma to ~490 Ma, corresponding to 0.2–0.6 mm/yr of exhumation. This duration of granulite‐facies metamorphism in the Larsemann Hills is consistent with estimates for Precambrian granulite facies metamorphic complexes elsewhere.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在通过独居石年代学和相平衡模拟，解析南极拉瑟曼丘陵多变质麻粒岩相岩石的寒武纪变质演化历史。

研究方法：研究采用电子探针独居石生长区年代测定和Perple_X伪剖面模型，结合独居石化学与相组合预测。

主要发现：确定了寒武纪变质作用的峰期条件（800-860°C，6-7.5 kbar），并识别了独居石生长域与不同构造阶段的关联，揭示了两阶段冷却历史。

创新点：本文创新性地结合独居石化学与伪剖面模型预测的相组合，将特定独居石生长域与具体的构造阶段关联起来。

相关性：本研究为冈瓦纳超大陆聚合相关的缝合带区域提供了详细的变质演化和冷却历史，对理解区域构造和麻粒岩相变质作用具有重要意义。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2021-01-01

Formation of abiotic CH<sub>4</sub> in UHP eclogites from S.W. Tianshan subduction zone: Implications for redox state of subducting slabs and deep carbon cycle

天山西南俯冲带超高压榴辉岩中非生物成因CH<sub>4</sub>的形成：对俯冲板片氧化还原状态和深部碳循环的启示

2021-01-01
Goldschmidt2021 abstracts 地球化学

Chao Wang，Lifei Zhang，Jesse B. Walters，Renbiao Tao

DOI: 10.7185/gold2021.5926

AI 总结

研究问题：研究西南天山超高压榴辉岩中非生物甲烷的形成机制及其对俯冲板片氧化还原和深部碳循环的影响。

研究方法：论文可能通过对西南天山超高压榴辉岩样品进行岩石学、矿物学和地球化学分析。

主要发现：发现西南天山超高压榴辉岩中存在非生物成因甲烷，并探讨其对俯冲板片氧化还原状态和深部碳循环的意义。

创新点：创新性地在西南天山超高压榴辉岩中发现非生物甲烷，并揭示其对俯冲板片氧化还原和深部碳循环的潜在影响。

相关性：该研究对理解深部碳循环、俯冲带地球化学以及地球内部氧化还原状态的演化具有重要价值。

多期变质榍石揭示的缅因州西部1亿年变质作用

2021-01-01

Jesse B. Walters，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe，Won Joon Song，Won Joon Song 等

研究问题：How can polymetamorphic titanite reveal the extended metamorphic history of Western Maine?

研究方法：The study employs analysis of polymetamorphic titanite to reconstruct metamorphic events.

主要发现：Polymetamorphic titanite records a 100-million-year metamorphic history in Western Maine.

创新点：It demonstrates the utility of polymetamorphic titanite for resolving protracted and complex metamorphic timelines.

Oxidized slab fluids revealed in metasomatized eclogites: A case study from Syros, Greece

交代蚀变榴辉岩中揭示的氧化板片流体：以希腊锡罗斯岛为例

2020-03-10
未知来源 地球化学

Jesse B. Walters，Horst R. Marschall，Pierre Lanari，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe

DOI: 10.5194/egusphere-egu2020-20622

&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Garnet-epidote oxybarometry, major element mineral compositions, and textural analysis of eclogites from Syros, Greece reveal the presence of high fO&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; slab fluids. The four investigated samples from blocks hosted in the serpentinite matrix m&amp;amp;#233;lange on Syros fall into three categories: unmetasomatized eclogite (Type I, n = 1), heavily metasomatized garnet-clinopyroxene bearing rocks (Type II, n = 2), and an eclogite which hosts veins of Andr + Acm + Ep + Hem + Chl (Type III, n = 1). Type I samples of metagabbroic eclogite are characterized by a peak assemblage of Grt + Cpx + Rt with abundant clinozoisite after lawsonite. In addition to Grt + Cpx, Type II samples contain Chl + Ilm + Py + Ap &amp;amp;#177; Ep &amp;amp;#177; Cam. Clinopyroxene compositions within Type I samples display a prograde trend of increasing jadeite and decreasing acmite. In contrast, the matrix clinopyroxene in one Type II sample exhibits compositions up to 60 % acmite component. Alternatively, clinopyroxene in the second Type II sample investigated exhibit an increase in acmite component during metasomatism. Type II samples also contain epidote and hematite-rich ilmenite as opposed to clinozoisite and rutile. The association of Fe&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;3+&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;-rich phases with sulfides, such as inclusions of acmitic pyroxene in pyrite, in Type II samples suggests a temporal link between sulfide deposition and oxidation of Fe&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;2+&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt; to Fe&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;3+&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt;. In contrast, the Adr + Acm + Ep + Chl + Hem veins in the Type III sample are sulfide absent and suggest fluids with &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; above the Hem-Mag and Hem-Py buffers.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Garnet-epidote oxybarometry revealed elevated &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; in metasomatically altered samples. Calculations were performed using a new oxybarometry Matlab code written by the authors. Our code utilizes the latest thermodynamic database, &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;A-X&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; models, and equations of state implemented in THERMOCALC. The code was also implemented in the XMapTools software package for quantitative visualization of &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; using EPMA X-ray maps. Fugacity calculations were conducted at 550 &amp;amp;#176;C, 2.0 GPa, and an &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;a&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;H&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt;O of unity, unless otherwise stated. Oxygen fugacities for clinozoisite-garnet pairs in the Type I sample were calculated in XMapTools and fall within 0.5 log units of the quartz-fayalite-magnetite (QFM) buffer. Inclusions of garnet in epidote and epidote overgrowths on garnet were selected for &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; calculation in the Ep-bearing Type II sample. These garnet-epidote pairs exhibit &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; of QFM+1.9 to +2.0. A minimum &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; of QFM+4 calculated from the Hem-Mag buffer is estimated for Type III veins. The remarkably high &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; of Type III veins contrasts with prograde &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt;conditions of QFM+1 to +2 estimated for epidote inclusions in garnet cores from the same sample at 400-450 &amp;amp;#176;C and 1.0-1.5 GPa. While elevated &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; and acmite inclusions in pyrite are consistent with a SO&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;x&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt;(aq)-Fe&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;2+&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt; redox pair in Type II samples, &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; above the Hem-Mag buffer require the bulk addition of Fe&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;3+&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt; or Mn&amp;lt;sup&amp;gt;3+&amp;lt;/sup&amp;gt; as a carrier of oxidation. These data demonstrate that slab fluids may impose &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;f&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;O&amp;lt;sub&amp;gt;2&amp;lt;/sub&amp;gt; well above the sulfur-sulfur oxide buffer.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;

AI 总结

研究问题：Investigating the presence and characteristics of high fO2 slab fluids in metasomatized eclogites from Syros, Greece.

研究方法：Utilized garnet-epidote oxybarometry, mineral composition analysis, textural analysis, and a new Matlab code with XMapTools for fO2 calculations on eclogite samples.

主要发现：Metasomatized eclogites exhibit significantly elevated fO2 (up to QFM+4) compared to unmetasomatized samples (QFM), revealing the presence of highly oxidized slab fluids.

创新点：Developed a new Matlab oxybarometry code, integrated with XMapTools, for quantitative fO2 visualization using EPMA X-ray maps.

相关性：This study provides critical insights into the highly oxidized nature of slab fluids, impacting our understanding of subduction zone geochemistry and redox cycling.

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2020-01-01

Sulfur and Trace Metal Cycling at Convergent Margins

汇聚板块边缘的硫和微量金属循环

2020-01-01
Digital Commons - UMaine (University of Maine) 地球化学

Jesse B. Walters

Subduction zones are the site of long-term chemical exchange between Earth’s surface and interior geochemical reservoirs. Subducting slabs are progressively depleted in volatiles and other mobile elements through dehydration and melting reactions. These elements are then introduced to the mantle wedge and volcanic arc. One consequence of this cycle is that volcanic arcs produce the most oxidized magmas on Earth. Sulfur, which exhibits a range in valence states from S2- to S6+, is one of the few elements in the subducting slab capable of oxidizing the arc and mantle wedge. Sulfides in the slab may also act as an important host of chalcophile and siderophile minor and trace elements (CSEs), such as Co, Ni, Cu, and As. The extraction of sulfur from the slab may also liberate and transfer these elements to the arc, where they may contribute to the formation of ore deposits. Such chemical and advective processes, which occur at depths in excess of 50 km, are not directly observable. Rocks and minerals in exhumed high-pressure terranes provide a chemical archive of sulfur and CSE extraction during subduction. In this dissertation, I examine the sulfur isotopic composition of sulfides in high-pressure and slab fluids, predict the concentration and speciation of sulfur in slab fluids, and characterize the CSE budget of the subducted mafic crust.\nSulfur isotopes are a sensitive indicator of redox conditions and sulfur mobility. In situ sulfur isotope measurements were conducted using secondary ion mass spectrometry (SIMS) on sulfides in high-pressure metamorphic rocks. Sulfides are classified into two categories: 1. Metamorphic sulfides, which preserve a record of prograde subduction metamorphism, and 2. Metasomatic sulfides precipitated from slab-derived fluids. The isotopic composition of metamorphic sulfides reflects their protolith compositions: −4.3 to +13.5 ‰ for metabasic rocks, and −32.4 to −11.0 ‰ for metasediments. From these data, I estimate that prograde sulfide breakdown will release slab fluids with an isotopic composition of −11 to +8 ‰. Metasomatic sulfides exhibit a range in δ34S values from −21.7 to +13.9 ‰, significantly larger than the range of predicted slab fluid compositions. The observed range of metasomatic sulfide compositions likely indicates large isotopic fractions between and oxidized slab fluid and the precipitating sulfide grains.\nIn support of the sulfur isotope observations, I used equilibrium thermodynamic forward modeling software to predict the speciation and concentration of sulfur in slab fluids. Sulfur loss from the slab is sensitive to protolith Fe3+/SFe ratio and subduction zone thermal structure. Subduction of altered oceanic crust in cold subduction zones was found to produce significant fluxes of sulfate and sulfite species. In contrast, subduction along a warm subduction geothermal gradient produces a bi-modal release of sulfur-bearing fluids, with a low-volume shallow flux of reduced sulfur, followed by a high-volume deep flux of sulfate and sulfite species. Sulfur oxidation in these systems is balanced by ferric iron reduction. Matrix sulfides in high-pressure metamorphic rocks are rarely associated with peak metamorphic conditions, suggesting that sulfur is almost completely extracted from the slab across the blueschist to eclogite transition. The thermodynamic models predict that sulfur oxidation is balanced by iron reduction in the eclogitic slab residuum. This prediction is supported by the observation that oceanic eclogites display lower bulk rock Fe3+/SFe when compared to blueschist and altered oceanic crust.\nPrograde sulfur-loss is anticipated to redistribute and/or release sulfide-hosted minor and trace CSEs. In situsulfide and silicate compositions were determined by laser ablation inductively coupled mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) for the elements Cr, Co, Ni, Cu, Zn, Ga, Ge, As, Mo, Ag, Cd, In, Sn, Sb, Te, Tl, and Bi. Sulfides host nearly the entire Cu, As, Ag, Cd, and Te budget of subducted rocks. These elements are incompatible in garnet, omphacite, phengite, and rutile, and are almost completely lost from the slab during prograde sulfide breakdown. Cobalt, Ni, Zn, Ga, Ge, Mo, Sn, and Tl are hosted in silicate and oxide phases. While Co, Ni, Zn, Ga, and Pb may be partially lost during lawsonite, epidote, and amphibole dehydration reactions, Ge, Tl, Sn, and Mo are largely retained in garnet, phengite, and rutile. Mobilization of the latter elements may require high fO2 conditions or melting. Consistent with estimated CSE budgets, minor and trace element zoning in metasomatic sulfide and silicate minerals suggest that Co, Ni, and As are mobile in slab fluids. Sulfur lost from the slab is expected to oxidize the subarc mantle and arc magmas, whereas mobile CSE elements may contribute to the formation of arc-related ore deposits.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探究俯冲带中硫和痕量金属的循环机制，及其对弧岩浆氧化和矿床形成的影响。

研究方法：研究采用了二次离子质谱（SIMS）进行硫同位素测量、热力学正向模拟预测硫的形态和浓度，以及激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）分析痕量元素组成。

主要发现：硫在俯冲板片中被大量提取，氧化地幔楔，并迁移特定的痕量金属（如Cu, As, Ag, Cd, Te），这些元素有助于形成矿床。

创新点：本研究创新性地结合了原位硫同位素和痕量元素分析与热力学模型，以理解不可直接观测的深部地球硫和痕量金属循环过程。

相关性：这项研究对于理解弧岩浆氧化、地幔楔演化以及会聚边缘经济重要矿床的形成机制至关重要。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2020-01-01

Distribution of First Row Transition Elements in Eclogites

榴辉岩中第一行过渡元素的分布

2020-01-01
Goldschmidt Abstracts 地球化学

Natalie Harmon，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe，Jesse B. Walters

DOI: 10.46427/gold2020.956

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探究第一行过渡元素在榴辉岩中的分布模式及其控制因素。

研究方法：推测采用了地球化学分析技术，可能包括原位微量元素分析，以确定元素在矿物中的分布。

主要发现：研究揭示了第一行过渡元素在榴辉岩不同矿物相中的具体分布特征和分区行为。

创新点：提供了关于高压变质岩中关键过渡元素地球化学行为的新数据和见解。

相关性：有助于理解俯冲带地球化学、地幔物质循环以及变质岩中微量元素的分配机制。

2019-12-01

Joshua S. Stone，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe，H. L. Brooks，Jesse B. Walters

AI 总结

研究方法：研究采用了激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体串联质谱（LA-ICP-MS/MS）技术进行分析。

Mantle oxidation driven by variable sulfur release during subduction

俯冲过程中可变硫释放驱动的地幔氧化

2019-12-01
AGU Fall Meeting Abstracts 地球化学

Alicia Cruz‐Uribe，Jesse B. Walters，Horst R. Marschall

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨俯冲过程中硫释放的变化如何驱动地幔氧化。

研究方法：论文可能采用地球化学分析、实验岩石学或数值模拟等方法研究硫循环与地幔氧化。

主要发现：主要发现是俯冲过程中硫释放的变异性是驱动地幔氧化的关键机制。

创新点：创新点在于提出俯冲带硫释放的变异性是地幔氧化过程的一个重要且未被充分认识的驱动因素。

ZR-RUTILE THERMOMETRY OF MÉLANGE ROCKS FROM SYROS, GREECE

希腊锡罗斯岛混杂岩的Zr-金红石测温

2019-01-01
Abstracts with programs - Geological Society of America 岩石学

Joshua S. Stone，Natalie Harmon，Kimberley Biela，Jesse B. Walters，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe 等

DOI: 10.1130/abs/2019ne-328241

AI 总结

TRACE ELEMENT ZONING IN TITANITE FROM SYROS, GREECE: IMPLICATIONS FOR COUPLED SUBSTITUTION MECHANISMS

希腊锡罗斯岛榍石中的微量元素环带：对耦合置换机制的启示

2019-01-01
Abstracts with programs - Geological Society of America 矿物学

Kimberley Biela，Joshua S. Stone，Natalie Harmon，Jesse B. Walters，Alicia Cruz‐Uribe 等

DOI: 10.1130/abs/2019ne-328246

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探究希腊锡罗斯岛榍石中的微量元素分区及其对耦合替代机制的启示。

研究方法：研究可能采用了微量元素分析技术（如电子探针或LA-ICP-MS）来揭示榍石中的元素分区。

主要发现：核心发现预计将阐明榍石中微量元素分区如何反映或控制其内部的耦合替代机制。

创新点：创新点在于通过详细分析希腊锡罗斯岛榍石的微量元素分区，为耦合替代机制提供新的理解。

相关性：这项研究对理解榍石的晶体生长、地球化学过程及其作为地质示踪剂的应用具有重要价值。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2018-12-01

Trace element redistribution during rehydration of eclogite via sulfide-silicate reactions

榴辉岩再水化过程中通过硫化物-硅酸盐反应的微量元素再分配

2018-12-01
AGUFM 地球化学

Alicia Cruz‐Uribe，Jesse B. Walters，Horst R. Marschall

AI 总结

研究问题：本文研究榴辉岩再水化过程中，硫化物-硅酸盐反应如何导致微量元素重新分布。

研究方法：论文可能通过实验模拟或对天然样品进行地球化学分析来研究反应过程。

主要发现：核心发现将揭示硫化物-硅酸盐反应如何控制榴辉岩再水化时的微量元素迁移。

创新点：创新点在于聚焦硫化物-硅酸盐反应对榴辉岩再水化过程中微量元素重分布的影响。

相关性：该研究有助于理解俯冲带中元素的循环、地幔过程及矿床形成机制。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2017-06-21

Protracted thrusting followed by late rapid cooling of the Greater Himalayan Sequence, Annapurna Himalaya, Central Nepal: Insights from titanite petrochronology

尼泊尔中部安纳普尔纳喜马拉雅山脉大喜马拉雅层序的长期逆冲及随后的晚期快速冷却：来自榍石岩石年代学的启示

2017-06-21
Journal of Metamorphic Geology 构造地质学

Jesse B. Walters，Matthew J. Kohn

DOI: 10.1111/jmg.12260

ABSTRACT The Greater Himalayan Sequence ( GHS ) has commonly been treated as a large coherently deforming high‐grade tectonic package, exhumed primarily by simultaneous thrust‐ and normal‐sense shearing on its bounding structures and erosion along its frontal exposure. A new paradigm, developed over the past decade, suggests that the GHS is not a single high‐grade lithotectonic unit, but consists of in‐sequence thrust sheets. In this study, we examine this concept in central Nepal by integrating temperature – time ( T–t ) paths, based on coupled Zr‐in‐titanite thermometry and U–Pb geochronology for upper GHS calcsilicates, with traditional thermobarometry, textural relationships and field mapping. Peak Zr‐in‐titanite temperatures are 760–850°C at 10–13 kbar, and U–Pb ages of titanite range from c . 30 to c . 15 Ma. Sector zoning of Zr and distribution of U–Pb ages within titanite suggest that diffusion rates of Zr and Pb are slower than experimentally determined rates, and these systems remain unaffected into the lower granulite facies. Two types of T–t paths occur across the Chame Shear Zone ( CSZ ). Between c. 25 and 17–16 Ma, hangingwall rocks cool at rates of 1–10°C/Ma, while footwall rocks heat at rates of 1–10°C/Ma. Over the same interval, temperatures increase structurally upwards through the hangingwall, but by 17–16 Ma temperatures converge. In contrast, temperatures decrease upwards in footwall rocks at all times. While the footwall is interpreted as an intact, structurally upright section, the thermometric inversion within the hangingwall suggests thrusting of hotter rocks over colder from c . 25 to c . 17–16 Ma. Retrograde hydration that is restricted to the hangingwall, and a lithological repetition of orthogneiss are consistent with thrust‐sense shear on the CSZ . The CSZ is structurally higher than previously identified intra‐ GHS thrusts in central Nepal, and thrusting duration was 3–6 Ma longer than proposed for other intra‐ GHS thrusts in this region. Cooling rates for both the hangingwall and footwall of the CSZ are comparable to or faster than rates for other intra‐ GHS thrust sheets in Nepal. The overlap in high‐ T titanite U–Pb ages and previously published muscovite 40 Ar/ 39 Ar cooling ages imply cooling rates for the hangingwall of ≥200°C/Ma after thrusting. Causes of rapid cooling include passive exhumation driven by a combination of duplexing in the Lesser Himalayan Sequence, and juxtaposition of cooler rocks on top of the GHS by the STDS . Normal‐sense displacement does not appear to affect T–t paths for rocks immediately below the STDS prior to 17–16 Ma.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文通过研究尼泊尔中部大喜马拉雅序列（GHS）的温度-时间路径，检验GHS由一系列逆冲岩片组成的新范式。

研究方法：研究采用锆石-钛矿温度计和U-Pb年代学结合传统热压计、结构关系及野外地质填图，构建温度-时间路径。

主要发现：查梅剪切带（CSZ）上盘在25-17/16 Ma经历逆冲作用，导致热岩体覆盖冷岩体，随后上盘快速冷却（≥200°C/Ma）。

创新点：本研究识别出尼泊尔中部GHS内结构位置更高的逆冲断层，并揭示其持续时间比其他断层长3-6 Ma。

相关性：本研究通过详细的钛矿岩石年代学，为理解GHS的构造演化、逆冲作用机制和快速剥露过程提供了关键证据。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2017-01-01

CA-TIMS U-PB DATES FROM HADEAN ZIRCON FROM THE JACK HILLS, AUSTRALIA: IMPROVING THE ACCURACY OF AGES OF METAMORPHOSED DETRITAL ZIRCON

来自澳大利亚Jack Hills冥古宙锆石的CA-TIMS U-Pb定年数据：提高变质碎屑锆石年龄的准确性

2017-01-01

James L. Crowley，Mark D. Schmitz，John S. Myers，Jesse B. Walters

研究方法：研究采用了高精度化学磨蚀-热电离质谱（CA-TIMS）U-Pb定年技术。

主要发现：CA-TIMS U-Pb定年技术显著提高了变质太古宙碎屑锆石年龄测定的准确性。

创新点：创新点在于将高精度CA-TIMS方法应用于复杂变质太古宙碎屑锆石的定年，以克服传统方法的局限性。

相关性：这项研究通过改进地质年代学方法，为更精确地理解地球早期历史提供了关键数据和工具。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2017-01-01

南极洲普里兹湾拉斯曼丘陵的寒武纪麻粒岩相变质作用：利用热力学模拟为独居石岩石年代学提供依据

2017-01-01
Abstracts with programs - Geological Society of America 岩石学

Jesse B. Walters，Steven K. Spreitzer，Edward S. Grew，M. L. Williams，Martin G. Yates 等

DOI: 10.1130/abs/2017am-302124

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在确定南极普里兹湾拉瑟曼丘陵寒武纪麻粒岩相变质作用的条件和时间。

Titanite petrochronology supports protracted transport along a high-level thrust within the Greater Himalayan Sequence, Central Nepal.

榍石岩石年代学支持尼泊尔中部大喜马拉雅地层序列内沿高位逆冲断层的持续输运

2015-12-14
2015 AGU Fall Meeting 构造地质学

Jesse B. Walters，Matthew J. Kohn
